信息扩术 ”中文编码字符集
1 本文件规定了信息技术用的中文图形字符及甚二进制编码的十六进制表示 。
本文件适用于中文和其他文字图形字符信息的处理、交换、存储、传给、显现 、输入和输出。
本文件适用于为具备中文和其他文字图形字符信息化处理及交换功能的技术类产品,包括但不限于以输入法、光学字符识别 (OCR)、编辑 校对、机融翻诺、语音合成、文字转写、乔能写作等为代表的软件产品 , 以及以计算机、通信终端设备、电子书阅读毅、学习机等为代表的便件产品 。
2 规泄性引用文件
下列文件中的内容通过文中的规范性引用而构成本文件必不可少的条款。
其中, 注日期的引用文件,仅该日期对应的版本适用于本文件;不注日期的引用文件,其最新厂本(包括所有的修改单)适用于本文件。
GB/T 2312 一 1980 ”信息交换用汉字编码字符集 ”基本集
GB/I 11383 一 1989 信息 处理 ”信息交换用八位代码结构和编码规则
GB/工 13000 信息技术通用多八位编码字符集(UCS)
3 术语和定义
下列本语和定义适用于本文件 。
3.1 字符 character
供组织、控制或表示数据用的元素集合中的一个元素。
3.2 编码字符 coded character
字符 (3.1) 及其编码 示。
3.3 用户自定区 private use area
使用符合本文件的产品的使用者可以自行规定的区域。
3.4 字汇 repertoire
用编码字符 (3.2) 集表示的一个指定的字符(3.1)集合 。
3.5 保 区 reserved zone
留作未来本文件规定的区 域 。
4 字汇
4.1 概述
本文件收录的字符以单字节、双字或四字节编码 。
单字节部分收录了 GB/T 11383 一 1989 的 0x00~0x7F 全部 128 个字符 。
4.3 双字节部分
双字节部分收录了 GB/T 2312 一 1980 中的全部图形字符 GB/T 13000 中的CJK 统一汉字以及部分图形字符。
双字节部分的字符按照附录 A 的规定。
其中,表意文字描述符的图形、代码位置和功能应符合附录 B 的规定 。
注: GB/T 13000 对中国、日本、恩国、越南等国家和地区使用的汉字统一编码。
具备独有抽象字形的汉字,赋予单独的代码位置;来源不同而抽象字形相同的汉字, 则赋予共用的代码位置。
经过编码的汉字称为CJK 统一汉字 CCJK Unified Ideographs,其中 CJK 表示中国、日本、韩国。
4.4 四字节部分
四字节部分收录了上述双字节字符之外的 GB/T 13000 中的 66 个CJK统一汉字(9FA6 一 9FEF，不包括 9FB4~9FBB 的8个字符)、CJK 统一汉字扩充 A、CJK 统一汉字扩充 BCJK 统一汉字扩充 C、 CJK 统一汉字扩充 DCJK 统一汉字扩充下 .CJK 统一汉字扩充 F 和已经 在 GB/ 工 13000 中编码的少数民族文字的字符。
四字节部分的字符按照附录 C 的规定 。
5 总体结构
正文中凡数字前标有 0x 的表示采用十六进制,未标有 0x 的表示采用十进制。
附录中凡编码的表示均采用十六进制,其他数字的表示均采用十进制。
单字节部分采用 GB/T 11383 一 1989 的编码结构,使 用 0x00~0x7F 码位。
双字贡部分采用两个八位二进制位串表示一个字符,其首字节码位从 0x81 一 0xFE, 尾字节码位分别是 0x40 一 0x7E 和 0x80 一 0xFE。
四字节部分采用 GB/工 11383 一 1989 未采用的 0x30 一 0x39 作为对双字节编码扩充的后缀,编码范围为 0x81308130 一 0xFE39FE39。

四字节字符的第一个字厄编码范围为 0x81 一 0xFE;第二个字记编码范围为 0x30 一 0x39; 第三个字节编码范围为 0x81 一 0xFE;第 四个字市编码范围为 0x30 一 0x39。 即 : 0x81308130 一 0x81308139; 0x81308230 一 0x81308239 0x8130FEFE30 一 0x8130FE39 ; 0x81318130 一 0x81318139 ; Oo2douolag0c “0URo23061393 0xFE39FE30 一 0xFE39FE39 。
总体结构与码位范围分配见图 1 和表 1。
6 字符的排列顺序
6.1 单字刷部分字符的排列顺序
单字记部分字符按照 GB/I 11383 一 1989 中相应字符的顺序排列 。
6.2 双字市部分字符的排列顺序
双字下部分字符排列顺序应符合附录 A。
6.3 四字刷部分字符的排列顺序
自 0x81308130 至 0x8439FE39 共 50400 个码位,对应双字节部分未包括的所有 GB/T 13000 基本多文种平面的字符,按照GB/T13000 基本多文种平面相应字符的顺序排列 。
自 0x90308130 至 0xE339FE39 共 1058400 个码位用于对应 GB/T 13000 的16个辅助平面,字符排列顺序完全按照 GB/I 13000 的 16个辅助平面的相应码位顺序依次排列 。
四字节部分字符排列顺序应符合附录 C。
7 码位分配
1.单字市部分的码位分配
单字节部分的码位按照 GB/T 11383 一 1989 的规则分配。
单字节码位分配见图 2。
2.双字部分的码位分配
双字节部分的码位安排分为 0x8140~ 一 0xFE7E 和 0x8180 一 0xFEFE 两部分, 共 23940 个码位。
双字节码位分配见图 3 及表 2。

GB 18030 - 2022 "Information Expansion" Chinese Encoding Character Set This document specifies the Chinese graphic characters used in information technology and their hexadecimal representation in binary encoding. This document applies to the processing, exchange, storage, transmission, display, input, and output of Chinese and other graphic character information. This document applies to technical products that have the capability for the information processing and exchange of Chinese and other graphic character information, including but not limited to software products represented by input methods, optical character recognition (OCR), editing and proofreading, machine translation, speech synthesis, text transcription, and intelligent writing, as well as hardware products represented by computers, communication terminal devices, e-book readers, and learning machines. 2 Regulatory Reference Documents The contents of the following documents constitute essential provisions of this document through normative references within the text. Among them, for referenced documents with a date, only the version corresponding to that date applies to this document; for referenced documents without a date, the latest version (including all amendments) applies to this document. GB/T 2312 - 1980 "Character Set for Information Exchange Using Chinese Characters" Basic Set GB/I 11383.1-1989 Information Processing "Eight-bit Code Structure and Coding Rules for Information Exchange" GB/Industry 13000 General Multi-Eight-Bit Encoding Character Set (UCS) for Information Technology 3 Terms and Definitions The following terms and definitions apply to this document. 3.1 Character An element in a set of elements used to organize, control, or represent data. 3.2 Coded Character Character (3.1) and its encoding representation. 3.3 Private Use Area A user-defined area that can be specified by users of products that comply with this document. 3.4 Vocabulary repertoire A specified set of characters (3.1) represented by a set of encoded characters (3.2). 3.5 Reserved zone Reserved for the area specified in this document for future use. GB 18030-2022 4 Vocabulary 4.1 Overview The characters included in this document are encoded in single-byte, double-byte, or four-byte formats. The single-byte section includes all 128 characters from 0x00 to 0x7F of GB/T 11383-1989. 4.3 Double-byte section The double-byte section includes all graphic characters from GB/T 2312-1980, the CJK Unified Ideographs from GB/T 13000, as well as some graphic characters. The characters in the double-byte section are specified according to Appendix A. Among them, the graphics, code positions, and functions of the ideographic character descriptors should comply with the provisions of Appendix B. Note: GB/T 13000 is a unified encoding for Chinese characters used in countries and regions such as China, Japan, Korea, and Vietnam. Chinese characters with unique abstract glyphs are assigned separate code positions; characters with the same abstract glyph but different origins are assigned shared code positions. The encoded Chinese characters are referred to as CJK Unified Ideographs, where CJK stands for China, Japan, and Korea. 4.4 Four-byte section The four-byte section includes 66 CJK Unified Ideographs from GB/T 13000 that are not part of the aforementioned double-byte characters (from 9FA6 to 9FEF, excluding the 8 characters from 9FB4 to 9FBB), as well as CJK Unified Ideographs Extension A, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension B, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension C, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension D, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension F, and characters from minority languages that have already been encoded in GB/T 13000. The characters in the four-byte section are specified according to Appendix C. 5 Overall Structure In the main text, numbers marked with 0x are in hexadecimal, while those not marked with 0x are in decimal. In the appendix, all representations of codes are in hexadecimal, while other numbers are represented in decimal. The single-byte section uses the encoding structure of GB/T 11383-1989, utilizing the code points from 0x00 to 0x7F. The double-byte section uses two eight-bit binary strings to represent a character, with the first byte code points ranging from 0x81 to 0xFE, and the second byte code points ranging from 0x40 to 0x7E and 0x80 to 0xFE, respectively. The four-byte section uses the unused 0x30 to 0x39 from GB/T 11383-1989 as suffixes for the expansion of double-byte encoding, with the encoding range from 0x81308130 to 0xFE39FE39. The encoding range for the first byte of a four-byte character is from 0x81 to 0xFE; the encoding range for the second byte is from 0x30 to 0x39; the encoding range for the third byte is from 0x81 to 0xFE; and the encoding range for the fourth byte is from 0x30 to 0x39. That is: 0x81308130 to 0x81308139; 0x81308230 to 0x81308239; 0x8130FEFE30 to 0x8130FE39; 0x81318130 to 0x81318139; 0xFE39FE30 to 0xFE39FE39. The overall structure and code point range allocation can be found in Figure 1 and Table 1. The arrangement order of 6 characters. 6.1 The arrangement order of characters in the single-byte section. The characters in the single-byte section are arranged according to the order of the corresponding characters in GB/T 11383-1989. 6.2 The arrangement order of certain characters in double-byte city parts. The arrangement order of the characters in the lower part of the double-byte should comply with Appendix A. 6.3 The arrangement order of certain characters in the four-byte brush part. From 0x81308130 to 0x8439FE39, there are a total of 50,400 code points, corresponding to all characters in the GB/T 13000 Basic Multilingual Plane that are not included in the double-byte part, arranged in the order of the corresponding characters in the GB/T 13000 Basic Multilingual Plane. From 0x90308130 to 0xE339FE39, a total of 1,058,400 code points are used for the 16 supplementary planes of GB/T 13000, with the character arrangement order completely following the corresponding code point order of the 16 supplementary planes of GB/I 13000. The arrangement order of the characters in the four-byte part should comply with Appendix C. 7 Code Point Allocation 1. Code Point Allocation for Single-Byte City Parts The code points of the single-byte part are allocated according to the rules of GB/T 11383-1989. 4.1 Overview

They both process input files using one or more of the four steps: preprocessing, compilation, assembly, and linking. The suffix of the source file identifies the language of the source file, but for the compiler, the suffix controls the default settings. GCC considers the preprocessed file (.i) as a C file and sets the linking in C format. G++ considers the preprocessed file (.i) as a C++ file and sets the linking in C++ format. 对于没有参数的函数声明, 例如 `int foo ();', 按 C 风格处理 --- 即不说明参数个数或类型. (仅针对 C++) .
正常情况下, 这样的函数 foo 在 C++ 中意味着参数为空.
节清单从这里删到试图支持传统 C 编译器的某些方面.
详见NU c 手册,我们已经把细节删除, 这样当内容过时后, 人们也不会 HERI.
除了一件事: 对于 c++ 程序 (不是C)，` -traditional' 选项带来一个附加效应,允许对 this 赋值.
他和`-Ethis-is-variable' 选项的果一样.
-traditional-cpp 试图支持传统 Cc 预处理器的某些方面.
特别是上面提到有关预处理器的内容, 但是不包括 `-traditional' 选项的其他效应.
-fdollars-in-identifiers 允许在标识符 (identifier) 中使用 `$' 字符 (仅针对 C++) .
你可以指定 `“-Efno-dollars-in-identifiers' 选项显明禁止使用 `$' 符.
(GNU C++ 在某些目标系统缺省允许 `$' 符, 但不是所有系统.)
-fenum-int-equiv 允许 ant 类型到枚举类型 (enumeration) 的隐式转换 (MEF c++) .
正常情况下 GNU C++ 允许从 enum 到 int 的转换,反之则不行.
-fexternal-—templates 为模板声明 (template declaration) 产生较小的代码 (仅限于 c++)，方法是对于每个模板函数 (template function),只在 定义他们的地方生成一个副本.
想要成功使用这个选项, 你必须在所有使用模板的文件中,标记`#pragma implementatio'(定义)或 `#Pragma interface'(声明).
程序用 `-fexternal-templates ' 编译时, 模板实例 (template instantiation) 全部是外部类型.你必须让需要的实例在实现文件中出现.
可以通过 typedef 实现这一点, 他引用所需的每个实例.
相对应的, 如果编译时使用缺省选项 ` -fno-exteznal-templates', 所有模板实例明确的设为内置.
所有的成员函数(除了构造子函数和 mnew 或 delete 成员操作符) 视为所在类的虚函数.
这不表明每次调用成员函数都将通过内部虚函数表.
有些情况下, 编译器能够判断出可以直接调用某个虚函数; 这时就直接调用.
-fcond-mismatch 允许条件表达式的第二和第三个参数的类型不匹配.
这种表达式的值是 Void.-fthis-—is-variable 允许对 this 赋值 (仅对 c++).
合并用户自定义的自由存储管理机制到 c++ 后,使可赋值的`this' 显得不合时宜.
因此, 默认情况下, 类成员函数内部对 this 赋值是无效操作.
然而为了向后兼容, 你可以通过 `-fthis-is-variable' 选项使这种操作有效.
-funsigned-char 把 char 定义为无符号类型,如同 unsigned char.
各种机器都有自己缺省的 char 类型. 既可能是 unsigned char 也可能是 signed char.
理想情况下, 当依赖于数据的符号性时, 一个可移植程序总是应该使用 signed char 或 unsigned chaz.
但是许多程序已经写成只用简单的 char, 并且期街这是有符号数(或者无符号数, 具体情况取决于编写程序的目标机器).
这个选项, 和它的反义选项, 使那样的程序工作在对应的默认值上.
char 的类型始终应该明确定义为 signed char 或 unsigned char, 即使它表现的和其中之一完全一样.
如果没有明确声明 ` signed' 或 "unsigned'修饰符, 这些选项用来定义有符号位域 (bitfield) 或无符号位域.
缺省情况下,位域是有符号的, 因为他们继承的基本整数类型,如 int,是有符号数，然而, 如果指定了 `-traditional' 选项,位域永远是无符号数.
-fwritable-strings把字符串常量存储到可写数据段, 而且不做特别对待.
这是为了兼容一些老程序,他们算改字符串常量是一个非常糟糕的想法、`-traditional' 选项也有相同效果.

在许多国家，这一疾病己使医疗服务机构穷于应付，几近崩溃，各国政府实施的限制措施已在全球经济中造成了严重紊乱。
对于毒品市场，这场疫情的影响尚不清楚，也很难预测，但有可能影响深远。
一些生产者可能会被迫寻找新的方法来制造毒品，因为限制流动的同时也限制了前体和基本化学品的获取。
贩运者由于旅行限制而无法越境，可能不得不寻找新的路线和方法。
毒品使用和提供的模式可能会改变，政府的应对能力也可能会受到阻碍。
新冠肺炎带来的转变是前所未有的，但还是可以从以往的危机中吸取一些经验教训。
2008年经济危机后，一些吸毒者开始寻找更便宜的合成物质，使用模式转向注射毒品。
与此同时，各国政府削减了与毒品相关的预算。
如果各国政府以同样的方式应对当前的经济衰退，预防吸毒和相关风险行为等干预措施和戒毒治疗服务可能会受到沉重打击。
此外，拦截行动和国际合作的优先性可能会降低，使贩运者更容易行动。
一些国家有大量毒品通过商业航班走私，预计这些国家的贩毒活动受到的直接影响最大。
有信使将甲基苯丙胺等合成毒品放在随身背包或藏在私人行李中携带，有时数量很大。由于几乎各地都对航空客运实施了限制，利用商业航空旅行供应毒品的活动可能会完全中断。
尽管国际邮政供应链也受到了干扰，但利用暗网和货物邮寄进行贩运的活动可能会增加。
从长远来看，经济衰退和相关的封闭措施可能会打乱毒品市场。
由于不断上升的失业率和缺乏机会，贫困和弱势人群将更有可能以有害的方式吸毒，患上吸毒病症，并转向与毒品有关的非法活动一无论是生产还是运输。
贩毒组织可能会利用这种情况，向脆弱人群提供服务，并招募新成员来壮大队伍。
随着政府应对能力的降低，这些转变可能会快速扎根，成为许多社区的新现实。
扩张与复杂性
市场增长
人口增长模式部分解释了市场扩张的原因
世界各地的吸毒现象一直在增多，无论是从总体数字还是从吸毒者在世界人口中所占比例来看都是如此。
2009年估计吸毒者有2.1亿人，占全球15-64岁人口的4.8%,而2018年估计吸毒者有2.69亿人，占这类人口的5.3%。
在过去二十年期间，发展中国家吸毒情况的增长速度远远快于发达国家。
这在一定程度上反映了这一期间总体人口增长的差异、发达国家为7%,发展中国家为28%但也反映了发展中国家年 轻人口增长较快。
青少年和年轻成年人在吸毒者中所占比例最大。
在2000-2018年期间，发展中国家这一年龄段的人口增长了16%,而发达国家这一年龄段的人口减少了10%。
1城市化是当前和未来毒品市场的一个驱动因素
无论是发达国家还是发展中国家，城市地区的吸毒情况都多于农村地区。
吸毒情况总体增多的部分原因是人口从农村向城镇的大规模流动一目前全世界人口有一半以上生活在城市地区，而1960年这一比例为34%。
城市化可能是毒品市场未来动态的一个关键因素，特别是在城市化趋势更为突出的发展中国家。
财富的增加与吸毒情况增多相联，但承受疾病负担最大的是最贫穷的人在世界范围内，发达国家的吸毒情况比发展中国家更为普遍。
可卡因之类的毒品更是与世界上较富裕的地区联系较为牢固。
同样，在各国内部，社会富裕阶层的吸毒流行率较高。
但转为吸毒病症的比率较高的却是社会经济地位较低的人。
来自少数几个国家的数据表明，有害的吸毒模式与病症同低收入之间存在联系。
这些模式在较富裕的社会阶层似乎不太常见。
全球新冠肺炎危机造成的经济制约很可能会加剧包括吸毒者在内的最弱势群体的风险。
例如，劳动力市场的变化，如失业率上升，过去一直与吸毒情况的增加有关，而这场疫情己经迫使全球数千万人失业。
新冠肺炎或将导致毒品市场进一步扩张新冠肺炎的大流行可能会导致更多农民增加或从事非法作物种植，或是因为国家主管机关的控制能力降低，或是因为在经济危机之下可能有更多人不得不铤而走险，从事非法活动。
新冠肺炎的相关限制措施导致空中和陆路交通减少，海上贩运可能已经因此而增加，海上的拦截风险低，而且比空中或陆路走私的数量更多。
最近已有报告称可卡因货物直接从南美经由海路运往欧洲。
translation: Executive Summary The impact of COVID-19 on the drug market. Its impact may be similar to the economic crisis of 2008. The global COVID-19 pandemic has plunged the world into an unprecedented crisis. In many countries, this disease has overwhelmed healthcare institutions, bringing them to the brink of collapse, and the restrictions implemented by governments have caused severe disruptions in the global economy. The impact of this pandemic on the drug market is still unclear and difficult to predict, but it could have far-reaching effects. Some producers may be forced to seek new methods to manufacture drugs, as restrictions on movement also limit access to precursors and essential chemicals. Traffickers may have to seek new routes and methods as they are unable to cross borders due to travel restrictions. The patterns of drug use and supply may change, and the government's response capacity may also be hindered. The changes brought about by COVID-19 are unprecedented, but we can still learn some lessons from past crises. After the 2008 economic crisis, some drug users began to seek cheaper synthetic substances, and the pattern of use shifted to injecting drugs. Meanwhile, governments around the world have cut budgets related to drugs. If governments around the world respond to the current economic recession in the same way, interventions such as drug prevention and related risk behavior measures, as well as drug rehabilitation services, may be severely impacted. In addition, the priority of interception operations and international cooperation may decrease, making it easier for traffickers to operate. Some countries have a significant amount of drugs smuggled through commercial flights, and it is expected that the drug trafficking activities in these countries will be the most directly affected. Couriers carry synthetic drugs such as methamphetamine in their backpacks or hidden in personal luggage, sometimes in large quantities. Due to restrictions on air passenger transport almost everywhere, activities that supply drugs through commercial air travel may be completely disrupted. Although the international postal supply chain has also been disrupted, activities related to trafficking using the dark web and shipping goods may increase. In the long run, economic recession and related lockdown measures may disrupt the drug market. Due to the rising unemployment rate and lack of opportunities, impoverished and vulnerable groups are more likely to use drugs in harmful ways, develop substance use disorders, and turn to drug-related illegal activities, whether in production or trafficking. Drug trafficking organizations may take advantage of this situation by offering services to vulnerable populations and recruiting new members to strengthen their ranks. As the government's capacity to respond diminishes, these changes may quickly take root and become the new reality for many communities. Expansion and Complexity Market Growth The patterns of population growth partially explain the reasons for market expansion. The phenomenon of drug use has been increasing worldwide, both in terms of overall numbers and the proportion of drug users in the global population. In 2009, it was estimated that there were 210 million drug users, accounting for 4.8% of the global population aged 15 to 64, while in 2018, the estimated number of drug users rose to 269 million, representing 5.3% of this population group. Over the past twenty years, the rate of drug use in developing countries has increased much faster than in developed countries. This reflects, to some extent, the differences in overall population growth during this period, with developed countries at 7% and developing countries at 28%, but it also reflects the faster growth of the young population in developing countries. Adolescents and young adults make up the largest proportion of drug users. From 2000 to 2018, the population in this age group in developing countries increased by 16%, while in developed countries, it decreased by 10%. Urbanization is a driving factor in the current and future drug market. Whether in developed or developing countries, drug use is more prevalent in urban areas than in rural areas. One of the reasons for the overall increase in drug use is the large-scale migration of the population from rural to urban areas; currently, more than half of the world's population lives in urban areas, compared to 34% in 1960. Urbanization may be a key factor in the future dynamics of the drug market, especially in developing countries where the trend of urbanization is more pronounced. The increase in wealth is associated with a rise in drug use, but it is the poorest people who bear the greatest burden of disease. Globally, drug use is more prevalent in developed countries than in developing countries. Drugs like cocaine are more strongly associated with the wealthier regions of the world. Similarly, within each country, the prevalence of drug use is higher among the affluent social class. However, the rate of those who develop drug addiction is higher among individuals with lower socioeconomic status. Data from a few countries indicate a correlation between harmful drug use patterns and low income. These patterns seem to be less common among the more affluent social classes. The economic constraints caused by the global COVID-19 crisis are likely to exacerbate the risks faced by the most vulnerable groups, including drug users. For example, changes in the labor market, such as rising unemployment rates, have historically been associated with an increase in drug use, and this pandemic has already forced millions of people worldwide into unemployment. The COVID-19 pandemic may lead to further expansion of the drug market, as more farmers may increase or engage in illegal crop cultivation, either due to reduced control capabilities of national authorities or because more people may be forced to take risks and engage in illegal activities amid the economic crisis. The restrictions related to COVID-19 have led to a decrease in air and land transportation, which may have resulted in an increase in maritime trafficking, as the risks of interception at sea are lower and the volume of smuggling by sea is greater than that by air or land. Recent reports have indicated that cocaine shipments are being transported directly from South America to Europe by sea.

original: 复杂性增强
非国际管制物质的出现情况稳定，但有潜在危害的新型类阿片正在增多毒品市场正日趋复杂。
除大麻、可卡因和海洛因等植物类物质之外，已经增添了数百种合成毒品，其中许多并不在国际管制之下。药品的非医疗使用也快速增多。
会员国的国内市场每年约有500种新型活性物质。
目前其中大多是兴奋剂，其次是合成的大麻素受体激动剂和少量的类阿片。
虽然新型精神活性物质的总体数量已经稳定下来，但比例发生了变化。
在2014年确定的新型精神活性物质种类总数中，类阿片新型精神活性物质仅占2%,但到2018年，这一数字己上升至9%。
类阿片新型精神活性物质中有许多是芬太尼的类似物，其药效和危害已得到证明，在北美导致了过量死亡事件，其他区域也有，但程度较轻。
在北美，芬太尼有的用作海洛因和其他毒品（包括可卡因和甲基苯丙胺）的掺杂剂，有的用来制造假冒的药用类阿片。
一些证据表明，欧洲也有注射新型精神活性物质兴奋剂的现象：一项对欧洲六个城市废弃注射器残留物的研宄发现，许多注射器都沾有产生兴奋作用的新型精神活性物质》
2新型精神活性物质的使用可能会逐渐牢固存在于弱势群体中
单一种类的新型精神活性物质几乎从未形成大的市场。
但来自欧洲的证据表明，合成大麻素在无家可归者和监狱囚犯等社会边缘群体中是一个严重的问题。
有22个国家报告了监狱中使用新型精神活性物质的情况，其中大多数国家将合成大麻素确定为主要挑战。
对前体化学品的管制迫使制毒者进行创新最常作为前体用来合成苯丙胺、甲基苯丙胺和“摇头丸”等毒品的许多化学品已被置于国际管制之下。
贩毒者和制毒者一直在寻找替代品一不仅有管制较松的物质，还有专门为规避管制而设计的化学品，即所谓的“特制前体”。
旨在阻止新冠肺炎传播的限制性措施很可能使依赖前体化学品的制毒者受到进一步挤压。
来自墨西哥的证据表明，这已经成为 现实：据报告，2020年3月，从东亚进口的甲基苯丙胺前体短缺促使墨西哥和美国的甲基苯丙胺价格上涨。
市场瞬息万变
合成药物在中亚和俄罗斯联邦取代阿片剂
中亚和俄罗斯联邦的阿片剂市场在2008年至2018年期间似乎发生了变化。
俄罗斯联邦当局截获的阿片剂数量下降了约80%，同时因使用类阿片而接受治疗的人数大幅减少。
但兴奋剂市场却似乎日渐兴旺。
有证据表明，甲基苯丙胺和各种卡西酮，包括甲氧麻黄酮和 a - 吡咯烷基苯戊酮，现在俄罗斯毒品市场上随处可见。
俄罗斯当局报告称，最近查获的制造各种非法药物的秘密加工点数量急剧上升，在两年内翻了一番多，2018年增至152个加工点。
阿富汗和伊拉克甲基苯丙胺市场增长
早在2012年，对医院、监狱和其他机构人员的调查就已经揭示了甲基苯丙胺在伊拉克的重要性。
结晶甲基苯丙胺已经成为“芬乃他林”和曲马多之外又一种令人担忧的主要药物。
2015年的一项研宄进一步证实了这些发现，吸毒者表示大麻比“芬乃他林”或甲基苯丙胺更难获得。
最近，伊拉克当局发现了多个甲基苯丙胺加工点，麻管局已对伪麻黄碱制剂的大批进口表示关切一甲基苯丙胺加工点将这些制剂用作前体。
在阿富汗，甲基苯丙胺制造似乎始于2014年。
自那时起，甲基苯丙胺的缉获量一直在稳步上升。
但2019年上半年的缉获量一^657公斤——与上一年相比大幅骤增。
在其他国家大量缉获了据认为源自阿富汗的甲基苯丙胺，这也表明该国的产量正在迅速上升。
translation: Increased complexity. The situation regarding non-internationally controlled substances is stable, but the emergence of new types of opioids with potential harm is increasing, making the drug market increasingly complex. In addition to plant-based substances such as cannabis, cocaine, and heroin, hundreds of synthetic drugs have been added, many of which are not under international control. The non-medical use of drugs is also rapidly increasing. Member states have approximately 500 new active substances in their domestic markets each year. Currently, most of them are stimulants, followed by synthetic cannabinoid receptor agonists and a small number of opioids. Although the overall number of new psychoactive substances has stabilized, the proportions have changed. Among the total number of new psychoactive substances identified in 2014, opioids accounted for only 2%, but by 2018, this figure had risen to 9%. Many of the new psychoactive substances that are opioids are analogs of fentanyl, whose potency and harm have been proven, leading to overdose deaths in North America, with other regions also affected, though to a lesser extent. In North America, fentanyl is used both as an adulterant in heroin and other drugs (including cocaine and methamphetamine) and to manufacture counterfeit prescription opioids. Some evidence suggests that there is also a phenomenon of injecting new psychoactive stimulant substances in Europe: a study of discarded syringes in six European cities found that many syringes were contaminated with new psychoactive substances that produce stimulating effects. The use of new psychoactive substances may gradually become firmly established among vulnerable groups. A single type of new psychoactive substance has almost never formed a large market. However, evidence from Europe indicates that synthetic cannabinoids are a serious issue among socially marginalized groups such as the homeless and prison inmates. Twenty-two countries reported the use of new psychoactive substances in prisons, with most of these countries identifying synthetic cannabinoids as the main challenge. The regulation of precursor chemicals forces drug manufacturers to innovate, as many chemicals that are commonly used as precursors to synthesize drugs such as amphetamines, methamphetamine, and ecstasy have been placed under international control. Drug traffickers and manufacturers have been seeking alternatives, not only substances with looser regulations but also chemicals specifically designed to evade control, known as "designer precursors." The restrictive measures aimed at preventing the spread of COVID-19 are likely to further squeeze drug manufacturers who rely on precursor chemicals. Evidence from Mexico indicates that this has become a reality: reports suggest that the shortage of methamphetamine precursors imported from East Asia in March 2020 led to an increase in methamphetamine prices in Mexico and the United States. The market is constantly changing. Synthetic drugs are replacing opioids in Central Asia and the Russian Federation. The opioid market in Central Asia and the Russian Federation appears to have changed between 2008 and 2018. The quantity of opioids intercepted by the authorities of the Russian Federation has decreased by about 80%, while the number of people receiving treatment for opioid use has significantly reduced. However, the market for stimulants seems to be thriving. There is evidence that methamphetamine and various cathinones, including methylenedioxypyrovalerone and α-pyrrolidinopentiophenone, are now ubiquitous in the drug market in Russia. Russian authorities report that the number of secret processing sites for the manufacture of various illegal drugs has sharply increased, more than doubling in two years, rising to 152 sites in 2018. The methamphetamine market in Afghanistan and Iraq is growing. As early as 2012, surveys of personnel in hospitals, prisons, and other institutions revealed the significance of methamphetamine in Iraq. Crystal methamphetamine has become another concerning major drug alongside fentanyl and tramadol. A study conducted in 2015 further confirmed these findings, with drug users indicating that cannabis is harder to obtain than fentanyl or methamphetamine. Recently, Iraqi authorities discovered multiple methamphetamine processing sites, and the narcotics bureau has expressed concern over the large importation of pseudoephedrine preparations, as these processing sites use these preparations as precursors. In Afghanistan, methamphetamine production seems to have started in 2014. Since then, the amount of methamphetamine seized has been steadily increasing. However, the amount seized in the first half of 2019 was 657 kilograms, a significant increase compared to the previous year. A large amount of methamphetamine believed to be sourced from Afghanistan has been seized in other countries, indicating that the country's production is rapidly increasing.

original: 政策变化和变化趋势
非医疗使用大麻合法化的法域大多有大麻使用增多的趋势
加拿大、乌拉圭和美国的11个法域允许制造大麻产品供非医疗使用。
在其中多数法域，大麻使用自合法化以来有所增多，尽管在其他未将非医疗使用大麻合法化的法域也观察到了同样的趋势。
在美国最早通过立法的两个州科罗拉多州和华盛顿州，成年人非医疗使用大麻的情况增加，特别是过去一个月以及每天或几乎每天使用的情况增多，自2012年起便已超过了全国平均水平。
所有指标都显示，自2011年以来，乌拉圭的大麻使用情况有所增加，上月使用情况几乎翻了一番。
这表明增加的主要原因是经常和频繁使用大麻。
加拿大的短期数据也表明，2018年至2019年合法市场扩大的同时，使用量也在增加。
然而，2019年仍有40%的大麻使用者靠非法来源获得某些产品。
全球大麻药草缉获量暴跌的背后原因是大麻合法化？
2018年，全球大麻药草缉获量降至20年来的最低水平，这是因为北美的缉获量下降，在过去10年中下降了 84%。
相比之下，同期世界其他地区的缉获量几乎翻了一番。缉获的模式表明，旨在放开大麻市场的政策在下降中发挥了关键作用。
对新型精神活性物质的监管似乎有遏制作用在国内对新型精神活性物质的监管效果仍然很难评估。
一些对新型精神活性物质采用不同监管制度的国家显示出不同的新型精神活性物质使用流行率。
在另一些国家，通过国内立法后，新型精神活性物质使用情况有所减少。
弱势群体面临合法和非法毒品市场的伤害用于疼痛管理和姑息治疗的药用类阿片主要在高收入国家提供止痛药在各区域分布不均。
2018年，所有可供医疗消费的药用类阿片中，90%以上在高收入国家。
大约50%在北美，40%在欧洲，还有2%在大洋洲。
这些国家的人口约占全球人口的12%。
据估计，低收入和中等收入国家的人口占全球人口的88%,但消费的药用类阿片却不到10%。
获取药用类阿片的障碍与许多因素有关，包括立法、文化、卫生系统和处方做法。
较贫穷的人患吸毒病症的风险更大2018年约有3,560万人患有吸毒病症。
贫困、有限的教育和社会边缘化可能会增加吸毒病症风险，并加剧其后果。高收入国家的研宄证实了这一点，在这些研究中，个人不利的社会经济轨迹一不仅仅是他们在某一时间点的状况一也与吸毒病症风险有关。
吸毒病症还会加深社会经济劣势，进一步增加失业、贫困和无家可归的风险，从而助长劣势的恶性循环。这些结果也可能与刑事司法系统内的侮辱性态度和后果有关。
妇女、少数民族和移民、性取向多样化群体、因武装冲突或灾难而流离失所的人以及农村环境中的人也可能受到吸毒病症的过重影响，或者在获得治疗服务方面遇到问题。
根据估计因残疾和过早死亡而损失的健康寿命年数的残疾调整寿命年（DALY)指标，在过去10年中，有害的吸毒对范围更广的社会影响加重。
2007年至2018年间，归因于吸毒的全球残疾调整寿命年数增加了 17%。
注射吸毒者中常见的未经治疗的丙型肝炎导致的肝癌的相关残疾调整寿命年数增幅特别高——达到40%。
毒品和暴力之间的关系错综复杂很难确定精神活性物质的使用和暴力之间的所有因果关系。
全球范围的有限数据表明，迷醉可能是杀人的一个重要因素。
但在暴力事件中，酒精的作用似乎比毒品更大。
虽然吸毒可能会导致犯罪，但在某些情况下，这种联系可以部分归因于多种中介因素，如社会经济劣势以及由个人风险、家庭环境和同龄人影响造成的其他类型的逆境。
贩毒和暴力之间的联系是多方面的。
如果已有稳定的犯罪结构，包括国际贩毒在内的大规模有组织犯罪活动有可能在无暴力的情况下实施。
短期内，暴力的存在和程度与其说取决于贩运的数量，不如说取决于造成有组织犯罪集团之间力量平衡不稳定的某些变化，例如非法市场规模的变化，知名罪犯的死亡或监禁，以及使一个集团弱于另一个集团的执法措施。
translation: Policy changes and trends. Most jurisdictions that have legalized the non-medical use of cannabis show a trend of increased cannabis use. Canada, Uruguay, and 11 jurisdictions in the United States allow the production of cannabis products for non-medical use. In most of these jurisdictions, cannabis use has increased since legalization, although the same trend has also been observed in other jurisdictions that have not legalized non-medical cannabis use. In the two states that were the first to legislate in the United States, Colorado and Washington, the incidence of non-medical cannabis use among adults has increased, particularly in the past month, as well as the frequency of daily or almost daily use, which has exceeded the national average since 2012. All indicators show that cannabis use in Uruguay has increased since 2011, with usage nearly doubling last month. This indicates that the main reason for the increase is the regular and frequent use of cannabis. Short-term data from Canada also indicates that while the legal market expanded from 2018 to 2019, usage also increased. However, in 2019, 40% of cannabis users still obtained certain products from illegal sources. Is the sharp decline in global cannabis herb seizures due to the legalization of cannabis? In 2018, global cannabis herb seizures fell to their lowest level in 20 years, due to a decline in seizures in North America, which decreased by 84% over the past decade. In contrast, seizures in other parts of the world nearly doubled during the same period. The patterns of seizures indicate that policies aimed at liberalizing the cannabis market played a key role in the decline. The regulation of new psychoactive substances seems to have a restraining effect, but it is still difficult to assess the effectiveness of domestic regulation on new psychoactive substances. Some countries that have adopted different regulatory systems for new psychoactive substances show varying prevalence rates of their use. In some other countries, the use of new psychoactive substances has decreased following domestic legislation. Vulnerable groups face harm from both legal and illegal drug markets, and medicinal opioids used for pain management and palliative care are primarily provided in high-income countries, with analgesics unevenly distributed across regions. In 2018, over 90% of all medicinal opioids available for medical consumption were in high-income countries. About 50% are in North America, 40% in Europe, and 2% in Oceania. The population of these countries accounts for about 12% of the global population. It is estimated that the population of low-income and middle-income countries accounts for 88% of the global population, but they consume less than 10% of the pharmaceutical opioids. The barriers to accessing pharmaceutical opioids are related to many factors, including legislation, culture, health systems, and prescribing practices. Poorer individuals are at a higher risk of substance use disorders, with approximately 35.6 million people affected by such disorders in 2018. Poverty, limited education, and social marginalization may increase the risk of substance use disorders and exacerbate their consequences. Research in high-income countries has confirmed this, showing that individuals' adverse socioeconomic trajectories—not just their status at a specific point in time—are also associated with the risk of substance use disorders. Substance use disorders can deepen socioeconomic disadvantages, further increasing the risks of unemployment, poverty, and homelessness, thereby fueling a vicious cycle of disadvantage. These outcomes may also be related to stigmatizing attitudes and consequences within the criminal justice system. Women, ethnic minorities, immigrants, individuals from diverse sexual orientations, those displaced by armed conflict or disasters, and people in rural environments may also be disproportionately affected by substance use disorders or encounter difficulties in accessing treatment services. According to estimates based on the Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALY) metric, which measures the years of healthy life lost due to disability and premature death, the harmful effects of substance use have intensified their broader social impact over the past decade. From 2007 to 2018, the global Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALY) attributed to substance use increased by 17%. The increase in disability-adjusted life years related to liver cancer caused by untreated hepatitis C, which is common among injection drug users, is particularly high—reaching 40%. The relationship between drugs and violence is complex, making it difficult to determine all the causal relationships between the use of psychoactive substances and violence. Limited data from around the world suggests that intoxication may be an important factor in homicide. However, the role of alcohol in violent incidents appears to be greater than that of drugs. original: 最新趋势
吸毒大麻是最常用的物质，类阿片危害最大
据估计，2018年使用大麻的有 1.92 亿人，使之成为全球使用最多的毒品。
相比之下，2018年使用类阿片的有5,800万人。
但阿片类药物的相关危害却因使用者较少而受到忽视。
在2017年与吸毒病症有关的估计167,000例死亡中，有66%是这类物质造成的，在据信为吸毒导致的残疾或过早死亡而损失的2,100万年寿命中，有50%是这类物质造成的。
合成类阿片的非医疗使用加剧了公共卫生危机
在西非、中部非洲和北非，加剧类阿片危机的是曲马多；在北美则是芬太尼。这两个区域在经济、人口统计数据或一般吸毒模式方面几乎没有共同点，但都在奋力抗击由容易获得且生产成本低的物质助长的类阿片危机。
在北美，芬太尼等合成类阿片的使用导致了20年来类阿片过量致死人数增加。
2018年，在美国登记的67,367例过量死亡中，有三分之二涉及芬太尼。
加拿大也报告了类似的结果，只是数字较低。
芬太尼导致过量死亡的部分原因是非法药物市场上的芬太尼药效不可预测。
在西非、中部非洲和北非，非医疗用途曲马多的市场已有大幅增长。
在该区域，接受治疗的曲马多使用病症患者越来越多。
2017年，全球截获的曲马多数量显著增加，达到125吨以上的峰值。
但2018年，在印度通过一项监管曲马多的新法律之后，全球缉获量降至32吨。
促成这两地危机的是制造简单和生产成本低，此外还有对曲马多和许多芬太尼类似物或其前体缺乏国际监管。
使这两地危机恶化的是这些物质在药品市场和非法市场上都有供应，因而更加难以发现和防止其滥用。
兴奋剂使用不断增多
兴奋剂领域以可卡因和甲基苯丙胺为主，这两种物质在其主要市场的使用量都在上升。
2018年使用可卡因的约有1,900万人，因为可卡因在北美和西欧颇为流行。
同年使用苯丙胺的约有2,700万人，其中甲基苯丙胺是东南亚和北美使用最多的苯丙胺类兴奋剂。
根据所掌握的多数指标，20年来这两个区域甲基苯丙胺的使用一直在扩大。
在一些市场上，可卡因和甲基苯丙胺可以共存，有时是相互替代，这样一种药物的使用量上升时另一种药物的使用量就下降，有时是同时增加和减少以满足同一市场的需求。
新冠肺炎使注射吸毒者的风险增高
据估计，2018年注射吸毒的约有1,130万人，全球艾滋病毒感染约有10%是注射吸毒造成的。
注射吸毒者感染艾滋病毒的超过100万人，患丙型肝炎的有550万人。
2017年，因吸毒死亡的约有 58.5万人，其中一半死于丙型肝炎引起的肝病，而注射吸毒者的丙型肝炎大多仍未得到治疗。
5 新冠肺炎限制措施造成的类阿片短缺可能导致使用者代之以酒精或苯二氮类药物等更容易获得的物质，或者将类阿片与合成药物混合。
随着一些使用者改用注射或更频繁地注射，可能会出现更多有害的使用方式。
translation: Latest trends Marijuana is the most commonly used substance, while opioids are the most harmful. It is estimated that 192 million people used cannabis in 2018, making it the most widely used drug in the world. In comparison, 58 million people used opioids in 2018. However, the associated harms of opioid drugs are often overlooked due to the smaller number of users. Of the estimated 167,000 deaths related to drug use in 2017, 66% were caused by these substances, and 50% of the 21 million years of life lost due to disability or premature death believed to be caused by drug use were attributed to these substances. The non-medical use of synthetic opioids has exacerbated the public health crisis. In West Africa, Central Africa, and North Africa, the crisis of opioids is exacerbated by tramadol, while in North America, it is driven by fentanyl. These two regions have almost no commonalities in terms of economy, demographics, or general patterns of drug use, yet both are struggling to combat the opioid crisis fueled by substances that are easily accessible and low in production cost. In North America, the use of synthetic opioids such as fentanyl has led to an increase in opioid overdose deaths over the past 20 years. In 2018, two-thirds of the 67,367 overdose deaths recorded in the United States involved fentanyl. Canada has also reported similar results, albeit with lower numbers. One reason fentanyl contributes to overdose deaths is the unpredictable potency of fentanyl in the illegal drug market. In West Africa, Central Africa, and North Africa, the market for non-medical use of tramadol has seen significant growth. In this region, there is an increasing number of patients using tramadol for treatment. In 2017, the global seizure of tramadol significantly increased, reaching a peak of over 125 tons. However, in 2018, following a new regulation on tramadol in India, the global seizure amount dropped to 32 tons. The crises in these two regions are driven by the ease of manufacturing and low production costs, as well as the lack of international regulation on tramadol and many fentanyl analogs or their precursors. What exacerbates the crises in these two regions is the availability of these substances in both the pharmaceutical and illegal markets, making it even more difficult to detect and prevent their abuse. The use of stimulants is continuously increasing. The stimulant field is dominated by cocaine and methamphetamine, both of which are seeing an increase in usage in their main markets. In 2018, approximately 19 million people used cocaine, as it is quite popular in North America and Western Europe. In the same year, approximately 27 million people used amphetamines, with methamphetamine being the most widely used amphetamine stimulant in Southeast Asia and North America. According to the majority of indicators available, the use of methamphetamine in these two regions has been expanding over the past 20 years. In some markets, cocaine and methamphetamine can coexist and sometimes substitute for each other; when the usage of one drug increases, the usage of the other decreases, and at times both can increase or decrease simultaneously to meet the demands of the same market. COVID-19 has increased the risks for injection drug users. It is estimated that in 2018, there were about 11.3 million people who injected drugs, and approximately 10% of global HIV infections were caused by injection drug use. Over 1 million injection drug users are infected with HIV, and 5.5 million have hepatitis C. In 2017, approximately 585,000 people died from drug use, half of whom died from liver disease caused by hepatitis C, and most injection drug users with hepatitis C have not yet received treatment. The shortage of opioids caused by COVID-19 restrictions may lead users to substitute with more readily available substances such as alcohol or benzodiazepines, or to mix opioids with synthetic drugs. As some users switch to injection or inject more frequently, more harmful methods of use may emerge.

The ease of production, low cost, and absence of international regulation of tramadol and several fentanyl analogs or their forerunners all contribute to the situation in both places.
The availability of these medications in both prescription and illegal markets, which makes it more challenging to identify and stop abuse, exacerbates the situation in both locations.
An increase in doping use
Cocaine and methamphetamine, which both have rising use in their key areas, dominate the stimulant market.
In 2018, about 19 million people used cocaine, as it is widely utilized in Western Europe and North America.
In the same year, 27 million people took amphetamines, with methamphetamine being the most popular ATS in North America and South-East Asia.
Most indicators show that methamphetamine usage has been rising in both regions for the past 20 years.

Cocaine and methamphetamine can coexist in some markets, occasionally substituting for one another, causing the use of one drug to climb while the usage of the other lowers, or occasionally both rising and falling to satisfy demand in the same market.
COVID-19 increases risk for injecting drug users
In 2018, it was projected that 11,300 thousand people used injectable drugs, and 10% of HIV infections worldwide are linked to injecting drug usage.
HIV infects more than 1 million drug injectors, while hepatitis C affects 5,500 thousand.
Half of the estimated 0.585 million drug-related deaths in 2017 were attributable to liver illness brought on by hepatitis C, which is largely untreated among injecting drug users.

5 Users may substitute more readily available substances, such as alcohol or benzodiazepines, or combine opioids with synthetic narcotics as a result of opioid shortages brought on the COVID-19 regulations.
Some users switching to injections or injecting more regularly may lead to the emergence of more hazardous patterns of usage.

original: 欧盟峰会为难民政策争论，欧盟官员：接收过程步步瓶颈-中新网
欧盟峰会为难民政策争吵不休，欧盟官员：接收过程每一步都存在瓶颈
【环球时报驻比利时特派记者 牛瑞飞】据法新社2月10日报道，在当天最新的一次欧盟峰会上，欧盟委员会主席冯德莱恩表示，欧盟领导人同意就非法移民问题出台更严格的政策，以此更易于驱逐非法移民。
据报道，欧盟此举是对欧洲日益增长的非法移民问题关注的回应，如今，欧盟的核心问题在于，最终能被遣返的非法移民人数很少。
根据峰会文件，欧盟领导人呼吁委员会“立即调动大量欧盟资金”，以基础设施和监视等手段加强外部边界。
然而，欧盟与各成员国就围栏费用支付等问题争吵不休。
冯德莱恩一再表示，欧盟资金不会支付相关费用。
但一些成员国的外交官员称，如果欧盟能分担外部边界沿线安装摄像头、瞭望塔和其他基础设施的部分，这将给各国腾出国家预算从而加快建设进程。
欧洲Euractiv网站称，欧盟官员承认，难民接收过程每一步都存在瓶颈，有限的接收能力和成员国不堪重负的移民当局无法阻止难民在欧盟各国提交“无数”庇护申请，欧盟的难民接收系统处于近乎“永久性的危机”中。
据欧盟委员会估计，欧盟的申根国家去年收到超92万份庇护申请，比前一年增加近半。
与此同时，欧盟去年记录到超 33万次非法入境。
在该背景下，此次峰会还就一项“原则”达成协议，即欧盟国家可根据另一个成员国的法院判决将非法移民遣返回国。
此外，报道称，欧盟领导人还同意“增加对安全国家概念的使用”，这将为欧盟制定共同清单开辟道路。
(来源：环球时报 作者：牛瑞飞)
translation: EU summit debates refugee policy, EU officials: The reception process faces bottlenecks at every step - China News Service. The EU summit is embroiled in endless arguments over refugee policy, with EU officials stating that there are bottlenecks at every step of the reception process. [Global Times Special Correspondent in Belgium, Niu Ruifei] According to a report by AFP on February 10, during the latest EU summit that day, European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen stated that EU leaders agreed to implement stricter policies on illegal immigration to facilitate the expulsion of illegal immigrants. According to reports, the EU's move is a response to the growing concern over the issue of illegal immigration in Europe. Currently, the core problem for the EU is that very few illegal immigrants can ultimately be deported. According to the summit documents, EU leaders are calling on the Commission to "immediately mobilize a significant amount of EU funds" to strengthen external borders through means such as infrastructure and surveillance. However, the EU and its member states are embroiled in disputes over issues such as the payment for fence costs. Ursula von der Leyen has repeatedly stated that EU funds will not cover the related costs. However, diplomats from some member states have stated that if the EU could share the costs of installing cameras, watchtowers, and other infrastructure along the external borders, it would free up national budgets for the countries and accelerate the construction process. The European Euractiv website reports that EU officials acknowledge that there are bottlenecks at every step of the refugee reception process, and the limited reception capacity along with the overwhelmed immigration authorities in member states cannot prevent refugees from submitting "countless" asylum applications across EU countries, putting the EU's refugee reception system in a state of near "permanent crisis." According to estimates from the European Commission, Schengen countries in the EU received over 920,000 asylum applications last year, an increase of nearly half compared to the previous year. Meanwhile, the EU recorded over 330,000 illegal crossings last year. Against this backdrop, the summit also reached an agreement on a "principle" that EU countries can deport illegal immigrants based on the court rulings of another member state. In addition, reports indicate that EU leaders also agreed to "increase the use of the concept of safe countries," which will pave the way for the EU to establish a common list. (Source: Global Times Author: Niu Ruifei)

original: 美国升级“芯片战”重创全球半导体产业-中新网
最近，美国对华“芯片战”大有升级之势——先是荷兰、日本两国在美国施压下，同意启动对华半导体制造设备出口的管制；后有外媒报道，美国政府正考虑切断美国供应商与华为公司之间的所有联系，禁止美国供应商向华为提供任何产品；拜登政府还准备公布一项行政命令，限制美国对敏感的中国科技行业的投资……2023年开年不久，美国在遏制中国半导体相关产业发展上就恶招不断。
近年来，美国打击中国“芯”发展的动作从未停歇，一边精准打压对华半导体产供链，一边构建“去中国化”的半导体产业链联盟，图谋在先进半导体产业上彻底“甩开”中国。
无论是拉拢韩国建立“技术同盟”，还是与韩国、日本和中国台湾地区建立芯片“四方联盟”，亦或借由美日印澳“四边机制”“印太经济框架”等机制建立半导体产业链“小圈子”，美国通过把政治化、阵营化、武器化的手段引入半导体产业，企图搭建美国主导的封闭产供链循环，从而弥补其在芯片制造领域的短板，维护其在全球芯片产业的优势地位。
然而，美国大张旗鼓的对华“芯战术”，也是“伤敌一千自损八百”。
最近，美国知名芯片制造设备供应商泛林集团宣布，受最新一轮对华芯片制造设备出口禁令影响，集团将解雇1300名全职员工，未来两个季度还计划解雇1400名临时员工。
全球光刻机巨头荷兰阿斯麦控股公司最近警告，禁止向中国出口半导体制造设备，可能导致半导体价格上涨。
美媒分析，在美国政府对中国芯片和半导体等行业实施蛮横打压后，许多美国公司深受其害，包括电子设计自动化工具开发商、芯片设计商、晶圆制造设备生产商、芯片制造商本身等。
美国所谓打压中国先进半导体产业，却把全球半导体产业链、供应链拖下了水。
半导体产业是高技术和知识密集型产业，早已形成联系紧密的全球半导体产业链。
据专业人士估算，基于专业化分工，半导体产品的整个生产过程需要跨越各国边境70次以上，全程达到100天。
尽管美国半导体产业基础较强，但在制造能力特别是先进制程工艺上较为薄弱，严重依赖东亚地区。
即便美国极力引导先进芯片产供链转向美国主导的“小圈子”区域化发展，但全球半导体相关产业的地区分布和相互依赖局面很难被改变。
美国强力“重塑”“去中国化”的半导体产业链，重创全球半导体产业。
芯片是全球未来产业的核心，芯片产业的发展离不开全球各国共同参与。
近年来，美国采取一系列单边行动，相继出台《创新与竞争法案》《2022年美国竞争法案》《芯片和科学法案》，利用科技霸权，巩固本国技术领先优势；对盟友“恩威并施”，诱逼英特尔、台积电、三星等芯片制造企业赴美设厂，极力确保美国在芯片领域的全球领导地位。
短期看，美国确实给中国的芯片产业及相关产业发展制造了麻烦，收获了现实利益。
但长期看，美国歇斯底里地打压，倒逼中国芯片产业不断突破，让自己失去了巨大的中国市场，最终会极大削弱美国科技企业的创新意愿和创新能力，损害全球芯片产业发展。

translation: The U.S. escalates the "chip war," severely impacting the global semiconductor industry - China News Service. Recently, the U.S. has significantly escalated its "chip war" against China—first, the Netherlands and Japan agreed to impose export controls on semiconductor manufacturing equipment to China under U.S. pressure; then, foreign media reported that the U.S. government is considering cutting all ties between American suppliers and Huawei, prohibiting American suppliers from providing any products to Huawei; the Biden administration is also preparing to announce an executive order to restrict U.S. investments in sensitive Chinese technology sectors... Not long after the start of 2023, the U.S. has been employing various underhanded tactics to curb the development of China's semiconductor-related industries. In recent years, the U.S. has never ceased its efforts to undermine China's "chip" development, simultaneously targeting the semiconductor supply chain to China while building a "de-China" semiconductor industry chain alliance, aiming to completely "shake off" China in the advanced semiconductor industry. Whether it is courting South Korea to establish a "technology alliance," forming a chip "Quad Alliance" with South Korea, Japan, and Taiwan, or creating a small circle of semiconductor industry chains through mechanisms like the U.S.-Japan-India-Australia "Quad" and the "Indo-Pacific Economic Framework," the U.S. is attempting to introduce politicization, camp-based strategies, and weaponization into the semiconductor industry. This aims to build a closed production and supply chain cycle dominated by the U.S., thereby compensating for its shortcomings in chip manufacturing and maintaining its advantageous position in the global chip industry. However, the U.S.'s grandiose "chip strategy" against China is also a case of "wounding the enemy a thousand while harming itself eight hundred." Recently, the well-known U.S. chip manufacturing equipment supplier Lam Research announced that, due to the impact of the latest round of export bans on chip manufacturing equipment to China, the company will lay off 1,300 full-time employees and plans to lay off 1,400 temporary employees in the next two quarters. The global lithography giant ASML Holding in the Netherlands recently warned that the ban on exporting semiconductor manufacturing equipment to China could lead to an increase in semiconductor prices. U.S. media analysis indicates that after the U.S. government imposed harsh restrictions on China's chip and semiconductor industries, many American companies have been severely affected, including electronic design automation tool developers, chip designers, wafer manufacturing equipment producers, and the chip manufacturers themselves. The U.S. claims to suppress China's advanced semiconductor industry, but it has dragged the global semiconductor industry chain and supply chain down with it. The semiconductor industry is a high-tech and knowledge-intensive sector that has long established a closely interconnected global semiconductor industry chain. According to estimates by professionals, based on specialized division of labor, the entire production process of semiconductor products requires crossing national borders more than 70 times, taking a total of 100 days. Although the U.S. semiconductor industry has a strong foundation, it is relatively weak in manufacturing capabilities, especially in advanced process technologies, and is heavily reliant on the East Asian region. Even if the United States is vigorously guiding the advanced chip supply chain to shift towards a U.S.-led "small circle" regional development, it is difficult to change the regional distribution and interdependence of the global semiconductor-related industry. The U.S. is forcefully "reshaping" and "de-China-izing" the semiconductor supply chain, severely impacting the global semiconductor industry. Chips are the core of the future global industry, and the development of the chip industry relies on the joint participation of countries around the world. In recent years, the United States has taken a series of unilateral actions, successively introducing the "Innovation and Competition Act," the "2022 U.S. Competition Act," and the "CHIPS and Science Act," leveraging technological hegemony to consolidate its technological leadership; it has used both incentives and pressure on allies, enticing and compelling chip manufacturers like Intel, TSMC, and Samsung to establish factories in the U.S., striving to ensure America's global leadership in the chip sector. In the short term, the United States has indeed created difficulties for China's chip industry and related sectors, reaping tangible benefits. However, in the long term, the U.S.'s hysterical suppression will force China's chip industry to continuously make breakthroughs, causing the U.S. to lose the vast Chinese market, which will ultimately greatly weaken the innovation willingness and capability of American technology companies, harming the development of the global chip industry. Gao Qiao

original: 首批个人养老金理财产品开售 最短可只持有360天-中新网
首批个人养老金理财产品开售
家机构的7只产品可选 最短可只持有360天
个人养老金理财产品终于上线了。
2月10日，中国理财网发布首批个人养老金理财产品名单，工银理财、农银理财和中邮理财的7只个人养老金理财产品正式发售。
至此，个人养老金账户的“货架”终于集齐个人养老金储蓄、个人养老金理财、个人养老金保险、个人养老金公募基金四类产品。
据介绍，首批个人养老金理财产品，全部为公募类净值型开放式产品，其中新发产品5只、存续产品2只，除1只产品为混合类产品外，其余6只产品均为固定收益类产品。
北京青年报记者看到，5只新发产品中有4只来自工银理财，全部是固定收益类产品，最短持有期限分别为365天、540天、720天和1080天，对应的业绩比较基准(年化)分别为3.70 % - 4.20 % 、 4.10 % - 4.60 % 、 4.40 % - 4.90 % 、 5.25 % - 5.75 % 。
剩余一只新发产品是“邮银财富添颐·鸿锦最短持有1095 天 1 号 ” ， 也是固定收益类产品，2月10日开始募集，2月19日结束募集，风险等级为二级。
两只存续产品中，一只是农银理财“农银同心·灵动”360天科技创新人民币理财产品，投资性质为混合类，风险等级为三级。
另一只存续产品是“邮银财富添颐·鸿锦最短持有365 天 1 号 ” ， 固定收益类型，去年12月30日开始募集，今年1月4日正式运作，2月8日的累计净值为1.0011。
根据《国务院办公厅关于推动个人养老金发展的意见 》 ， 个人养老金资金账户资金可投资的金融产品包括银行理财、储蓄存款、商业养老保险、公募基金等。
首批个人养老金理财产品发售，标志着个人养老金投资者可正式通过个人养老金资金账户购买理财产品。
去年11月银保监会制定了《商业银行和理财公司个人养老金业务管理暂行办法 》 。
《办法》规定，参加人可以通过个人养老金资金账户购买个人养老储蓄、个人养老金理财产品、个人养老金保险产品、个人养老金公募基金产品等个人养老金产品。
随后，人社部、财政部、国家税务总局三部门发布通知，明确个人养老金制度在北京、天津，以及河北石家庄、雄安新区，山西晋城市等36个先行城市和地区启动实施。
截至2022年底，个人养老金参加人数1954万人，缴费人数613万人，总缴费金额142亿元。
此前，参与试点的银行只上架了个人养老储蓄、个人养老金保险产品和个人养老金公募基金三类产品。
如今，个人养老金理财产品也聚齐之后，投资者该如何选择？
交银理财产品研发部专家表示，相比其他个人养老金产品，试点阶段的养老理财产品和个人养老金理财产品均具有三方面的特点。
一是稳健性，风险管理机制更加健全，投资策略和理念更为稳健，并实施非母行第三方独立托管。
二是长期性，试点阶段养老理财产品的期限都在5年及以上，下一步发行的个人养老金理财产品，最短持有期原则上为1年，鼓励持有3年以上。
三是普惠性，产品购买门槛低，起购点一般为1元，有的低至0.01元，产品的托管费、管理费等费率更加优惠。
专业人士指出，投资者要根据产品特点和自己的风险承受能力进行选择。
个人养老金储蓄具有期限较长、利率较高、安全性高的特点，适合风险承受能力弱的人群；个人养老金保险产品重在保障，比较适合无法承担投资风险，可以接受稳定收益的人群；而个人养老金理财产品和公募基金产品不保本也不保收益，有一定投资风险，但预期收益较高，适合具备一定的金融知识、风险承担能力较高的人群。
文/本报记者 程婕 统筹/池海波
translation: The first batch of personal pension financial products is on sale, with a minimum holding period of only 360 days - China News Network. The first batch of personal pension financial products is now on sale. There are 7 products available for selection from the family institution, with a minimum holding period of just 360 days. Personal pension financial products are finally online. On February 10, China Wealth Management Network released the list of the first batch of personal pension financial products, and 7 personal pension financial products from ICBC Wealth Management, ABC Wealth Management, and China Post Wealth Management were officially launched for sale. At this point, the "shelf" of personal pension accounts has finally gathered four types of products: personal pension savings, personal pension financial products, personal pension insurance, and personal pension public funds. According to the introduction, the first batch of personal pension financial products consists entirely of publicly offered net value-type open-end products, including 5 newly issued products and 2 existing products. Except for 1 mixed product, the remaining 6 products are all fixed-income products. The Beijing Youth Daily reporter observed that among the 5 newly issued products, 4 are from ICBC Wealth Management, all of which are fixed-income products. The shortest holding periods are 365 days, 540 days, 720 days, and 1080 days, with corresponding annualized performance benchmarks of 3.70% - 4.20%, 4.10% - 4.60%, 4.40% - 4.90%, and 5.25% - 5.75%, respectively. The remaining newly issued product is "Post Bank Wealth Tianyi · Hongjin No. 1," which is also a fixed-income product. It will start fundraising on February 10 and end on February 19, with a risk level of Grade 2. Among the two existing products, one is the ABC Wealth Management "ABC Tongxin · Lingdong" 360-day technology innovation RMB financial product, which has a mixed investment nature and a risk level of Grade 3. The other existing product is "Post Bank Wealth Tianyi · Hongjin No. 1," which is a fixed-income type. It started fundraising on December 30 of last year, officially began operation on January 4 of this year, and had a cumulative net value of 1.0011 as of February 8. According to the "Opinions of the General Office of the State Council on Promoting the Development of Personal Pension Funds," the financial products that personal pension fund accounts can invest in include bank wealth management, savings deposits, commercial pension insurance, public funds, and more. The launch of the first batch of personal pension wealth management products marks the official opportunity for personal pension investors to purchase wealth management products through their personal pension fund accounts. In November of last year, the China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission formulated the "Interim Measures for the Management of Personal Pension Business by Commercial Banks and Wealth Management Companies." The "Measures" stipulate that participants can purchase personal pension products through their personal pension fund accounts, including personal pension savings, personal pension wealth management products, personal pension insurance products, and personal pension public fund products. Subsequently, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, the Ministry of Finance, and the State Taxation Administration issued a notice clarifying that the personal pension system will be launched and implemented in 36 pilot cities and regions, including Beijing, Tianjin, Shijiazhuang in Hebei, Xiong'an New Area, and Jinzhong City in Shanxi. As of the end of 2022, the number of participants in personal pensions reached 19.54 million, with 6.13 million contributors and a total contribution amount of 14.2 billion yuan. Previously, the banks participating in the pilot program only offered three types of products: personal pension savings, personal pension insurance products, and personal pension public fund products. Now that personal pension wealth management products have also come together, how should investors choose? Experts from the product development department of Bank of Communications Wealth Management stated that compared to other personal pension products, the pension wealth management products and personal pension wealth management products during the pilot phase have three main characteristics. First is stability, with a more robust risk management mechanism, more prudent investment strategies and philosophies, and the implementation of independent third-party custody that is not affiliated with the parent bank. Secondly, there is a long-term nature; the duration of the pilot phase pension financial products is all 5 years or more. The personal pension financial products to be issued next will have a minimum holding period of 1 year, with encouragement to hold for more than 3 years. Thirdly, there is inclusiveness; the purchasing threshold for the products is low, with the starting investment generally at 1 yuan, and some as low as 0.01 yuan. The rates for custody fees, management fees, and other charges are also more favorable. Professionals point out that investors should choose based on the characteristics of the products and their own risk tolerance. Personal pension savings have the characteristics of a longer duration, higher interest rates, and high safety, making them suitable for individuals with low risk tolerance; personal pension insurance products focus on protection and are more suitable for those who cannot bear investment risks and can accept stable returns; on the other hand, personal pension financial products and public mutual fund products do not guarantee principal or returns, carry certain investment risks, but offer higher expected returns, making them suitable for individuals with a certain level of financial knowledge and higher risk tolerance. Text/Reporter Cheng Jie Coordination/Pools Haibo

Subsequently, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, the Ministry of Finance, and the State Taxation Administration issued a notice clarifying that the personal pension system will be launched and implemented in 36 pilot cities and regions, including Beijing, Tianjin, Shijiazhuang in Hebei, Xiong'an New Area, and Jinzhong City in Shanxi.
As of the end of 2022, the number of participants in personal pensions reached 19.54 million, with 6.13 million contributors and a total contribution amount of 14.2 billion yuan.

Previously, the banks participating in the pilot program only offered three types of products: personal pension savings, personal pension insurance products, and personal pension public fund products.
Now that personal pension wealth management products have also come together, how should investors choose?

Experts from the product development department of Bank of Communications Wealth Management stated that compared to other personal pension products, the pension wealth management products and personal pension wealth management products during the pilot phase have three main characteristics.

First is stability, with a more robust risk management mechanism, more prudent investment strategies and philosophies, and the implementation of independent third-party custody that is not affiliated with the parent bank.

Secondly, there is a long-term nature; the duration of the pilot phase pension financial products is all 5 years or more. The personal pension financial products to be issued next will have a minimum holding period of 1 year, with encouragement to hold for more than 3 years.

Thirdly, there is inclusiveness; the purchasing threshold for the products is low, with the starting investment generally at 1 yuan, and some as low as 0.01 yuan. The rates for custody fees, management fees, and other charges are also more favorable.
Professionals point out that investors should choose based on the characteristics of the products and their own risk tolerance.

Personal pension savings have the characteristics of a longer duration, higher interest rates, and high safety, making them suitable for individuals with low risk tolerance; personal pension insurance products focus on protection and are more suitable for those who cannot bear investment risks and can accept stable returns; on the other hand, personal pension financial products and public mutual fund products do not guarantee principal or returns, carry certain investment risks, but offer higher expected returns, making them suitable for individuals with a certain level of financial knowledge and higher risk tolerance.

original: 健身行业应摆脱信任危机-中新网
又一大型健身房“暴雷”？
近日，知名健身机构中健健身会员维权问题引起社会关注。
春节后不少会员发现自己所在门店没有正常营业，随后，关于该机构倒闭跑路的传闻引起会员恐慌，导致公安、人社部门介入。
最后，该机构相关负责人出面回应，承诺会努力保障好员工和会员的合法权益，风波才得以平息。
个别健身机构的部分门店出现经营问题，暂时关闭，消费者本可心平气和等待问题解决，为何不少会员的第一反应是“大事不妙”？
健身俱乐部会员维权风波背后，是行业信任危机的深层次问题。
国内传统健身房普遍采取预付费模式，“赚用户不来的钱”是其发展的底层逻辑。
通过预售会员卡获取现金流，不断开新店，看似能够循环往复，实则寅吃卯粮，无法形成稳定的盈利模式。
健身房跑路等行业负面信息频频传出，对消费者信心造成强烈冲击。
从市场前景看，健身房当然算得上是一门有“钱途”的好生意。
健身赛道虽然起起伏伏，但始终受到资本关注。
多项数据显示，文体消费等领域热度不断攀升，市场持续回暖。
具体到健身市场，随着居民生活水平稳步提高，健康生活理念深入人心，健身行业发展大有可为。
形势越是趋好，行业越需重视发展质量。
然而，个别机构对消费复苏后的健身市场盲目乐观，刚从危机中走出来，又吹响开疆拓土的号角，把融资资金一股脑投入新店建设上。
不可否认，这几年受疫情影响，不少机构退出，行业重新洗牌，有实力的企业此时选择性地加大收购力度、重新布局，未尝不是新机遇。
但是，健身市场发展要想进入良性循环，迈上行稳致远的康庄大道，行业就必须改变传统模式，改变经营策略。
只有稳扎稳打，重新建立起消费者的信任度、安全感，才能真正赢得市场、赢得未来。
相比大建新店抢占市场，健身行业当前更需要的是沉下心来优化服务，用高质量发展来稳住用户。
首先，要靠服务留住用户。
健身房属于服务行业，其本质是坚持“用户导向”，要紧紧围绕用户需求，把经营重心放在服务提质升级上。
其次，要靠数字化转型提升用户体验。
比如当下流行的互联网健身房模式，实现用户按次付费和场地自选。
同时，身体数据、运动数据得以有效利用，还可以满足社交需求，实现从线上到线下完整的服务闭环。
没有私教推销，没有巨额年卡，用户对健身机构“跑路”的担忧降低了，信任感也就提升了。
另外，还要积极探索多元业态。
如今，体育消费已经从单一服务走向场景消费，健身俱乐部有望成为消费新入口，围绕健身所需的运动补给和健身器械等周边产品或将成为新的盈利点，为消费者提供更丰富选择。
姜天骄
translation: The fitness industry should overcome the trust crisis - China News Service. Another large gym "explodes"? Recently, the issue of member rights protection at the well-known fitness organization Zhongjian Fitness has attracted social attention. After the Spring Festival, many members found that their local branches were not operating normally, which led to rumors of the organization closing down and fleeing, causing panic among members and prompting intervention from the public security and human resources departments. Finally, a relevant person in charge of the organization came forward to respond, promising to make efforts to protect the legal rights and interests of employees and members, which helped to calm the situation. Some branches of certain fitness institutions are experiencing operational issues and are temporarily closed. Consumers could calmly wait for the problems to be resolved, so why is the first reaction of many members "this is serious"? Behind the turmoil of gym club members defending their rights lies a deeper issue of trust crisis within the industry. Traditional gyms in the country generally adopt a prepaid model, and "earning money without attracting users" is the underlying logic of their development. By generating cash flow through the presale of membership cards and continuously opening new stores, it may seem like a cycle that can repeat, but in reality, it is living off borrowed resources and cannot establish a stable profit model. Frequent reports of gyms shutting down and other negative information about the industry have severely impacted consumer confidence. From the perspective of market prospects, gyms can certainly be considered a promising business with good financial potential. Although the fitness industry has its ups and downs, it has always attracted the attention of capital. Multiple data sources indicate that the popularity of cultural and sports consumption is continuously rising, and the market is steadily recovering. Specifically in the fitness market, as residents' living standards steadily improve and the concept of a healthy lifestyle becomes deeply ingrained, there is great potential for the development of the fitness industry. The better the situation becomes, the more the industry needs to focus on the quality of development. However, some institutions are blindly optimistic about the fitness market after the recovery in consumption; having just emerged from the crisis, they are already sounding the horn for expansion and pouring all their financing into the construction of new stores. It is undeniable that in recent years, many institutions have exited the market due to the impact of the pandemic, leading to a reshuffling of the industry. At this time, strong companies are selectively increasing their acquisition efforts and restructuring, which could be seen as a new opportunity. However, for the fitness market to enter a virtuous cycle and embark on a stable and sustainable path, the industry must change its traditional models and adjust its business strategies. Only by steadily building trust and a sense of security among consumers can we truly win the market and secure the future. Compared to aggressively building new stores to capture the market, the fitness industry currently needs to focus on optimizing services and stabilizing users through high-quality development. First, we need to retain users through service. Gyms belong to the service industry, and their essence is to adhere to a "user-oriented" approach, closely focusing on user needs and placing the operational emphasis on upgrading and improving service quality. Secondly, we need to enhance user experience through digital transformation. For example, the currently popular internet gym model allows users to pay per visit and choose their own venues. At the same time, body data and exercise data can be effectively utilized to meet social needs and achieve a complete service loop from online to offline. With no personal trainer sales pitches and no hefty annual memberships, users' concerns about fitness institutions "running away" have decreased, and their sense of trust has increased. In addition, we should actively explore diverse business formats. Nowadays, sports consumption has shifted from a single service to scenario-based consumption, and fitness clubs are expected to become a new entry point for consumption. Surrounding products such as sports supplements and fitness equipment needed for workouts may become new profit points, providing consumers with richer choices. Jiang Tianjiao

扬子晚报讯(记者 马祚波)扬子晚报/紫牛新闻记者10日在采访中发现，十余年未见的“保价协议”又重回了南京楼市，位于江北新区的一家楼盘宣称“差价赔付”，在交房前其他房源的优惠大于之前的折扣，开发商愿意为买房人换房并退还差价。
“保价协议”条件可不少
这家位于江北新区的楼盘名为保利扬子萃云台，看房人孙先生告诉记者，他在上周末逛楼盘时发现了一则“声明”。
他发给记者的图片上显示，该楼盘的开发商承诺，凡是在2月1日-2月28日期间购买房源的，自双方签订买卖合同之日起至对应房源交付，若该项目其他房源的优惠折扣大于之前购房所享折扣的(限与该商品房属于同一户型、同一楼栋、同一单元、同一物业类型的其他未售商品房)，开发商可以为购房者换房并退还差价。
孙先生表示，置业顾问表示这其实就是一份“保价协议”，目的是让买家放心出手，不用担心开发企业降价促销，“现在就怕买完了它就降价了，去售楼处闹吧没时间，不闹的话也确实窝心”。
还有不少买房人则认为，“保价协议”虽然是在给购房者吃“定心丸”，不过条件却不低。
打算在江北买一套刚需房的郑女士说，保价的房源首先是要同一户型，还得在同一楼栋、同一个单元，买家可以比价的房源寥寥，因此“门槛”还是蛮高的。
也有购房者认为，由于信息不对称，销售时不排除给出额外的让利，买家“维权”的难度不小。
能否留住买房人有待观察
记者在南京网上房地产上查询得知，该楼盘于去年11月首领两幢楼共计252套房源的销许，户型面积有105平方米、114平方米、129平方米等，全装修销许均价为39843元/㎡。
不过两个多月过去，网上房地产显示目前该楼盘的未售总套数为157套，占比为62.3%，其中8号楼共计128套，未售套数达113套，7号楼的124套中也有44套未售，项目的总成交套数只有33套，占比仅为13%。
市场人士介绍，“保价协议”在2008年也曾在南京出现过。
当年8月份，河西黄山路上的楼盘横塘西苑为了吸引买房人眼球，推出了《保价计划》，具体内容为“公司郑重承诺，若一年内项目优惠幅度扩大，由此产生的差额，公司将按差额退还给老业主”。
此后2011年4月，南京也有9家楼盘拿出部分房源承诺“差价赔付”。
“楼市在回暖，此时更需要一针‘强心剂’。
”南京地产行业一位资深操盘手沈先生表示，“保价协议”也是房企的营销方式之一。
他认为如今开发企业比买房人更需要信心，推出“保价协议”其实也是在给其打气。
至于能否留住买房人，他表示这取决于调控政策、贷款门槛等多重因素的影响，就目前来看仍有待观察。
translation: Buy at a high price, and we'll refund the price difference! Nanjing real estate market sees the return of "price difference compensation" - China News Network Yangzi Evening News (Reporter Ma Zuobo) reported on the 10th that during an interview, it was discovered that the "price protection agreement," which had not been seen for over a decade, has returned to the Nanjing real estate market. A property in the Jiangbei New District claims to offer "price difference compensation," stating that if the discounts on other properties before the handover exceed the previous discounts, the developer is willing to allow homebuyers to switch properties and refund the price difference. There are quite a few conditions for the "price protection agreement." The property located in the Jiangbei New District is called Poly Yangzi Cuiyun Terrace. A potential buyer, Mr. Sun, told reporters that he discovered a "statement" while visiting the property last weekend. The image he sent to the reporter shows that the developer of the property promises that anyone who purchases a unit between February 1 and February 28, from the date the sales contract is signed until the corresponding unit is delivered, will be eligible for a refund of the price difference if the discounts on other units in the project exceed the discounts enjoyed by the previous buyer (limited to unsold units of the same type, same building, same unit, and same property type). The developer can allow the buyer to switch units and refund the price difference. Mr. Sun stated that the real estate consultant indicated this is actually a "price protection agreement," aimed at reassuring buyers so they can make purchases without worrying about the developer lowering prices for promotions. "What we fear now is that after buying, the price will drop. There's no time to go to the sales office to complain, and if we don't complain, it really is disheartening." Many homebuyers believe that while the "price protection agreement" is meant to reassure buyers, the conditions are quite stringent. Ms. Zheng, who plans to buy a necessary home in Jiangbei, said that for a price-protected property, it must be the same type, located in the same building and the same unit. There are very few comparable properties available for buyers, so the "threshold" is quite high. Some buyers believe that due to information asymmetry, there may be additional discounts offered during sales, making it quite difficult for buyers to protect their rights. Whether or not buyers can be retained remains to be seen. The reporter learned from the online real estate platform in Nanjing that the development received sales permits for two buildings totaling 252 units last November, with unit sizes of 105 square meters, 114 square meters, 129 square meters, etc. The average selling price for fully decorated units is 39,843 yuan per square meter. However, more than two months later, the online real estate platform shows that the total number of unsold units in the development is 157, accounting for 62.3%. Among these, Building 8 has a total of 128 units, with 113 unsold, while out of 124 units in Building 7, 44 remain unsold. The total number of transactions for the project is only 33 units, accounting for just 13%. Market insiders mentioned that the "price protection agreement" also appeared in Nanjing in 2008. In August of that year, the Heng Tang Xi Yuan development on Huangshan Road in Hexi launched a "Price Protection Plan" to attract buyers' attention. The specific content stated, "The company solemnly promises that if the discount on the project increases within one year, the company will refund the difference to existing owners." Subsequently, in April 2011, nine developments in Nanjing also offered a portion of their units with a promise of "price difference compensation." "The real estate market is warming up, and it needs a 'shot in the arm' at this time." "Mr. Shen, a senior operator in the Nanjing real estate industry, stated that the 'price protection agreement' is also one of the marketing strategies used by real estate companies." He believes that developers need confidence more than homebuyers do nowadays, and introducing the "price protection agreement" is actually a way to boost their morale. As for whether they can retain homebuyers, he stated that it depends on multiple factors such as regulatory policies and loan thresholds, and it remains to be seen at this point.

original: 多项数据衰退 台湾经济开年表现不佳-中新网
新华社台北2月11日电(记者赵博、黄扬)出口贸易额“连五黑”，制造业采购经理人指数(PMI)连续7个月紧缩，消费者物价指数(CPI)又见“3字头”……近期，台湾当局陆续发布2023年1月经济数据。
专家分析认为，台湾经济开年表现欠佳，增长压力不小。
据台当局财政事务主管部门公布，台湾地区今年1月出口315.1亿美元，年减21.2%，连续第5个月负增长。
11项主要出口货类的出口额与去年同期相比，均出现衰退。
塑橡胶及其制品、光学器材跌幅最深，分别年减37.6%、35.7%。
电子零组件出口年减20.1%，创11年来最大减幅。
其中，集成电路年减18.3%，创14年来最大跌势。
该部门统计处长蔡美娜表示，这显示消费性电子产业需求疲弱效应扩散，电子产业进入修正期。
统计显示，1月台湾地区进出口双降，出超金额仅23.4亿美元，创近3年来最低水平。
台当局财政事务主管部门认为，全球终端需求减少，产业调整库存抑制厂商购料意愿，出口颓势短期难见改善，台湾今年首季出口衰退恐高于预期。
据台湾中华经济研究院发布，今年1月台湾制造业采购经理人指数(PMI)经季节调整后为40.4%，较去年12月续跌3.3个百分点，连续7个月紧缩。
经济监测指标体系中，PMI以50%为荣枯线，指数大于50%，代表景气扩张，反之为紧缩。
1月台湾PMI五项组成指标中，新增订单、生产与人力雇佣紧缩，供应商交货时间下降，存货紧缩。
六大产业全数回报PMI紧缩，各产业依紧缩速度排序为电力暨机械设备产业(35.1%)、电子暨光学产业(35.2%)、化学暨生技医疗产业(39.2%)、基础原物料产业(42.4%)、交通工具产业(42.6%)与食品暨纺织产业(45.7%)。
物价方面，台当局“主计总处”公布，今年1月台湾CPI年增率为3.04%，自去年7月以来再度冲破3%。
其中，蔬菜价格飞涨28.25%，创17个月新高。
台“主计总处”专门委员曹志弘坦言，菜价涨幅确实超乎预期，排除春节因素，今年1月和2月平均CPI应接近去年12月的2.71%，通胀压力还是存在，且仍在高点。
展望今年台湾经济，综合《联合报》、“Yahoo财经”等岛内媒体报道，专家表示悲观。
台“中央大学”经济系教授吴大任分析，出口衰退可能造成出口制造业厂商现金流出现问题，债务违约风险上升。
同时，订单减少导致厂商削减人力成本，影响劳动市场和家庭经济，反过来冲击消费能力。
台湾经济研究院研究员邱达生认为，今年欧美通胀状况未解，需求持续萎缩，预估台湾出口衰退会延续到上半年。
由于台湾经济靠出口支撑，受出口低迷影响，全年经济增长表现将不如去年。
translation: Multiple data declines, Taiwan's economy performs poorly at the start of the year - China News Service. Taipei, February 11 (Xinhua) - Export trade has seen "five consecutive declines," the manufacturing Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) has contracted for seven consecutive months, and the Consumer Price Index (CPI) has once again shown a "3-digit" figure... Recently, the Taiwan authorities have successively released economic data for January 2023. Experts analyze that Taiwan's economy has performed poorly at the start of the year, facing significant growth pressure. According to the financial authorities of the Taiwan region, Taiwan's exports in January this year amounted to 31.51 billion USD, a year-on-year decrease of 21.2%, marking the fifth consecutive month of negative growth. The export value of 11 major export categories has declined compared to the same period last year. The decline in plastics, rubber, and their products, as well as optical instruments, is the steepest, with year-on-year decreases of 37.6% and 35.7%, respectively. The export of electronic components decreased by 20.1% year-on-year, marking the largest decline in 11 years. Among them, integrated circuits decreased by 18.3% year-on-year, marking the largest decline in 14 years. The head of the department's statistics office, Tsai Mei-na, stated that this indicates a spreading effect of weak demand in the consumer electronics industry, signaling that the electronics industry has entered a correction period. Statistics show that in January, Taiwan's imports and exports both declined, with a trade surplus of only 2.34 billion USD, the lowest level in nearly three years. The financial authorities of Taiwan believe that the decrease in global terminal demand and the industry's inventory adjustments are suppressing manufacturers' willingness to purchase materials, making it difficult to see an improvement in export trends in the short term. The decline in Taiwan's exports in the first quarter of this year is likely to be worse than expected. According to the Taiwan Institute of Economic Research, the seasonally adjusted Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) for Taiwan's manufacturing sector in January was 40.4%, a decrease of 3.3 percentage points from December of last year, marking seven consecutive months of contraction. In the economic monitoring indicator system, the PMI has a threshold of 50%; an index above 50% indicates economic expansion, while an index below 50% indicates contraction. In January, among the five components of Taiwan's PMI, new orders, production, and employment contracted, while supplier delivery times decreased and inventory tightened. All six major industries reported PMI contraction, with the industries ranked by the speed of contraction as follows: electrical and machinery equipment industry (35.1%), electronics and optics industry (35.2%), chemical and biotechnology medical industry (39.2%), basic raw materials industry (42.4%), transportation industry (42.6%), and food and textile industry (45.7%). In terms of prices, Taiwan's Directorate-General of Budget, Accounting and Statistics announced that the year-on-year CPI growth rate for January this year was 3.04%, once again surpassing 3% since July of last year. Among them, vegetable prices soared by 28.25%, reaching a 17-month high. Tsao Chih-hung, a special committee member of Taiwan's "Directorate-General of Budget, Accounting and Statistics," admitted that the increase in vegetable prices was indeed beyond expectations. Excluding the factors of the Spring Festival, the average CPI for January and February this year should be close to the 2.71% of last December, indicating that inflationary pressure still exists and remains at a high point. Looking ahead to Taiwan's economy this year, experts express pessimism based on reports from domestic media such as the "United Daily News" and "Yahoo Finance." Wu Da-ren, a professor in the Department of Economics at National Central University in Taiwan, analyzed that the decline in exports may lead to cash flow problems for export manufacturing companies, increasing the risk of debt defaults. At the same time, the decrease in orders has led manufacturers to cut labor costs, affecting the labor market and household economies, which in turn impacts consumer spending power. Qiu Da-sheng, a researcher at the Taiwan Institute of Economic Research, believes that the inflation situation in Europe and the United States remains unresolved, and demand continues to shrink, estimating that Taiwan's export decline will extend into the first half of the year. Since Taiwan's economy is supported by exports, the sluggish export performance will result in weaker economic growth for the entire year compared to last year.

Statistics show that in January, Taiwan's imports and exports both declined, with a trade surplus of only 2.34 billion USD, the lowest level in nearly three years.

The financial authorities of Taiwan believe that the decrease in global terminal demand and the industry's inventory adjustments are suppressing manufacturers' willingness to purchase materials, making it difficult to see an improvement in export trends in the short term. The decline in Taiwan's exports in the first quarter of this year is likely to be worse than expected.

According to the Taiwan Institute of Economic Research, the seasonally adjusted Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) for Taiwan's manufacturing sector in January was 40.4%, a decrease of 3.3 percentage points from December of last year, marking seven consecutive months of contraction.
In the economic monitoring indicator system, the PMI has a threshold of 50%; an index above 50% indicates economic expansion, while an index below 50% indicates contraction.
In January, among the five components of Taiwan's PMI, new orders, production, and employment contracted, while supplier delivery times decreased and inventory tightened.

All six major industries reported PMI contraction, with the industries ranked by the speed of contraction as follows: electrical and machinery equipment industry (35.1%), electronics and optics industry (35.2%), chemical and biotechnology medical industry (39.2%), basic raw materials industry (42.4%), transportation industry (42.6%), and food and textile industry (45.7%).

In terms of prices, Taiwan's Directorate-General of Budget, Accounting and Statistics announced that the year-on-year CPI growth rate for January this year was 3.04%, once again surpassing 3% since July of last year.
Among them, vegetable prices soared by 28.25%, reaching a 17-month high.

Tsao Chih-hung, a special committee member of Taiwan's "Directorate-General of Budget, Accounting and Statistics," admitted that the increase in vegetable prices was indeed beyond expectations. Excluding the factors of the Spring Festival, the average CPI for January and February this year should be close to the 2.71% of last December, indicating that inflationary pressure still exists and remains at a high point.
Looking ahead to Taiwan's economy this year, experts express pessimism based on reports from domestic media such as the "United Daily News" and "Yahoo Finance."

Wu Da-ren, a professor in the Department of Economics at National Central University in Taiwan, analyzed that the decline in exports may lead to cash flow problems for export manufacturing companies, increasing the risk of debt defaults.
At the same time, the decrease in orders has led manufacturers to cut labor costs, affecting the labor market and household economies, which in turn impacts consumer spending power.

Qiu Da-sheng, a researcher at the Taiwan Institute of Economic Research, believes that the inflation situation in Europe and the United States remains unresolved, and demand continues to shrink, estimating that Taiwan's export decline will extend into the first half of the year.
Since Taiwan's economy is supported by exports, the sluggish export performance will result in weaker economic growth for the entire year compared to last year.
