The audio input jacks on the back panel and the speaker output terminals are very poor; you can easily find a CD amplifier integrated machine in the 1000-2000 range that is much better than this model. 3. The top cover is relatively thin; my transformer side is even dented, and I had to open the box and use my hand to restore it. The connection between the top cover and the front panel is loose. 4. The entire machine's center of gravity is偏向 the transformer side, making it awkward to move. It feels like a beginner model from SONY, with that level of workmanship, produced in Malaysia. I'm not sure if it's because the transformer is too large and generates too much heat. Nowadays, we mostly use switch power supplies; this bulky transformer probably weighs around 4 kg. Sony should use an active cooling silent fan inside the machine; after unboxing, I only saw a large aluminum heat sink on the tube.

original: 最差的网购体验
9月28号下单后，系统显示已经发货，结果一直等到10月12号依然没有收到货。
查询亚马逊订单状态，卖家没有提供快递单号，查不到订单在哪儿。
于是发邮件给卖家问是否能提供快递单号，过了两天一直没有回复。
无奈之下，打亚马逊客服，客服告诉了卖家的手机号码，我再打电话问店家，打了几次之后，电话通了，被告知快递丢件了，可以立刻再重新发我一个。
虽然我特别生气，但是由于电脑急需要，所以也就没跟卖家多说，只要立刻发给我就好。
结果，第二天打电话问，发货了吗？
卖家说还没，下午才能发。
我下午又打电话问，卖家说一定发，下午五六点之后发货，结果等我晚上七点打电话，电话就没人接了。
第三天上午我又打，问货发出去了吗？
可以告诉我订单号了么？
卖家说没发，告诉我要是着急的话让我从别家订货，要是可以等的话下午就发。
没办法，从别家下单又要等好久。
就只能拜托卖家赶紧发货。
终于在无数个电话跟踪之后，我在10月16号收到了电脑。
至于电脑的质量怎样，我不知道，因为是给别人买的，后期再追加评论吧。
translation: The worst online shopping experience. After placing the order on September 28, the system showed that it had been shipped, but I still had not received the goods by October 12. I checked the status of my Amazon order, but the seller did not provide a tracking number, so I cannot find out where the order is. So I emailed the seller to ask if they could provide a tracking number, but I haven't received a reply after two days. In desperation, I called Amazon customer service, and they provided me with the seller's phone number. After calling the seller several times, I finally got through and was informed that the package was lost, but they could immediately send me a replacement. Although I was very angry, I didn't say much to the seller since I urgently needed the computer; I just asked them to send it to me immediately. As a result, I called the next day to ask if it had been shipped. The seller said not yet; it can only be shipped in the afternoon. I called again in the afternoon to ask, and the seller said it would definitely be shipped, around five or six in the afternoon. However, when I called at seven in the evening, no one answered the phone. On the morning of the third day, I called again to ask if the goods had been shipped. Can you tell me the order number now? The seller said it hasn't been shipped and told me that if I'm in a hurry, I should order from another store; if I can wait, it will be shipped in the afternoon. There's no way; ordering from another store will take a long time to wait again. I can only ask the seller to ship the goods as soon as possible. Finally, after countless follow-up calls, I received the computer on October 16th. As for the quality of the computer, I don't know because it was purchased for someone else; I will add comments later.

original: 强烈建议亚马逊停用EMS ！
商品五星，物流一星，平均三星。
不懂为什么亚马逊要寄EMS，业内公认的不靠谱，好嘛，电脑好歹也是贵重物品啊！
买后订单显示，预计20号送达，于是家里人在家等了三天！
从厦门寄到福州，为什么要四五天啊！
22号早上查物流终于到福州了，准备开开心心收货，结果，晚上在没收到任何电话、短信的情况下，一查物流，竟然中午就被签收了，还显示的本人签收！
我瞬间震惊了！
我是谁？我在哪儿？这电脑真是我买的吗？
简直怀疑人生了好么！
最后跑了一趟代收点才把电脑搬回来。
具体原因简单说就是因为快递小哥把两个单号弄反了，好在件没丢也就算了。
我强烈建议亚马逊不要用EMS了，以后亚马逊如果用EMS寄的快递，我一定不会再买了。
translation: It is strongly recommended that Amazon discontinue EMS! Product five stars, logistics one star, average three stars. I don't understand why Amazon would use EMS, which is widely recognized in the industry as unreliable. Come on, a computer is still a valuable item! After purchasing, the order showed that it was expected to be delivered on the 20th, so my family waited at home for three days! Why does it take four to five days to send something from Xiamen to Fuzhou? On the morning of the 22nd, I checked the logistics and it finally arrived in Fuzhou. I was ready to happily receive the package, but in the evening, without receiving any calls or messages, I checked the logistics and found out it had been signed for at noon, showing that I had signed for it myself! I was instantly shocked! Who am I? Where am I? Is this computer really mine? I'm seriously questioning my life here! I had to make a trip to the collection point to bring the computer back. The simple reason is that the delivery guy mixed up the two tracking numbers, but fortunately, the package wasn't lost, so it's fine. I strongly recommend that Amazon stop using EMS. If Amazon uses EMS for shipping in the future, I definitely won't buy from them again.

但不得不说的是亚马逊平台之官僚依旧，与几年前我发誓绝对不用的时候没有改进，你永远查不到实际物流状况，信息永远是几个星期以后送到，永远不能投诉，就是这么官僚！
货收到几天了，物流信息还是10几天后你将会收到货！
translation: The things are good, but the platform is still bureaucratic. The hard drive is of very good quality, with absolutely high cost performance; it's cheaper than buying in Hong Kong. If you are not in a hurry to use it and can tolerate the logistics, I definitely recommend purchasing it. But I have to say that the bureaucracy on the Amazon platform is still the same as it was a few years ago when I vowed never to use it again. You can never find out the actual logistics status; the information is always that it will be delivered weeks later, and you can never file a complaint. It's just that bureaucratic! The goods have been received for a few days, but the logistics information still says you will receive the goods in over ten days!

original: 有史以来体验最差的一次购物

老婆没手机用难受死了，第二天一早6点多叫我在想想办法，后来上京东一看256G有货可以当天送到，只得立马再订购一台。
新的买好了，就想着马上把亚马逊的订单给取消。
由于订单是半夜下的，没可能凌晨来收快递，7点多打给客服要求取消订单，客服答复已经取消请等待短信通知。
好吧，我就耐心的等着，到了中午上手机一看，订单还在状态还处于未发货，就立马联系客服要求赶快取消订单，客服答复已经操作OK。
到了下午3点上手机一看订单还在，没办法只能再次联系客服明确告知已经第三次来电了，请取消订单并通知卖家务必不要发货！
客服在我要求下当场联系了卖家，并告知我卖家不熟悉系统，要等熟悉系统后再操作取消订单。
但是明确告诉我卖家已经知道了，绝对不会发货的请放心。
等到周一我再看订单显示，竟然已经发货了，我也是无语了。
由于无法直接联系卖家，只能再次致电客服。
后面的处理简直无语，基本都是我说一步，客服才接着操作一下。
订单到目前为止还是处于派件拒收状态，正准备再次派送！
亚马逊难道不会主动跟进下吗？
卖家公司反正也收了钱不跟进也无所谓了。
总结下以后大件绝对不会预付钱了，这个样子太麻烦了。
translation: The worst shopping experience ever. On the evening of September 23, my wife's phone fell, and on a whim, I immediately ordered an 8P from Amazon. It was in stock, but it wasn't sold by Amazon directly and there was no price increase (which made me secretly happy). Since it wasn't fulfilled by Amazon, the shipping was relatively slow, and the system indicated that the latest expected delivery would be by September 27. My wife was really upset without her phone, so the next morning around 6 o'clock, she asked me to think of a solution. Later, I checked JD and saw that a 256GB model was in stock and could be delivered the same day, so I had to immediately order another one. With the new one purchased, I thought about canceling the Amazon order right away. Since the order was placed in the middle of the night, it was impossible to pick up the delivery in the early morning. I called customer service around 7 AM to request the cancellation of the order, and the customer service representative replied that it had been canceled and to wait for a text notification. Alright, I will wait patiently. When I checked my phone at noon, the order was still in the "not shipped" status, so I immediately contacted customer service to request a quick cancellation of the order. The customer service representative replied that it had been processed successfully. By 3 PM, I checked my phone and saw that the order was still there. I had no choice but to contact customer service again and clearly inform them that this was my third call, requesting to cancel the order and to notify the seller not to ship it under any circumstances! The customer service representative contacted the seller at my request and informed me that the seller was not familiar with the system and would need to wait until they were familiar with it before proceeding to cancel the order. However, they clearly told me that the seller is already aware and will definitely not ship the order, so please rest assured. When I checked the order on Monday, it surprisingly showed that it had already been shipped, and I was at a loss for words. Since I couldn't contact the seller directly, I had to call customer service again. The subsequent handling was simply frustrating; basically, I had to tell them what to do step by step before customer service would take any action. The order is still in a delivery refusal status and is about to be dispatched again! Doesn't Amazon take the initiative to follow up on this? The selling company has already received the money, so it doesn't matter if they don't follow up. To summarize, I will definitely not make any advance payments for large items in the future; this situation is too troublesome.

My wife felt really uncomfortable with the absence of a mobile phone, I was requested to come up with a solution the next morning at 6:00 am Later, I returned to Jingdong and saw that the 256G was in stock and could be delivered the same day, so I ordered another one right away.
I planned to cancel the Amazon order as soon as I purchased the new one.

Because the order was placed in the middle of the night, the courier could not arrive in the early morning, I called customer service after 7 o'clock and requested that the order be cancelled, the customer support representative said that it has been canceled, and to wait for the SMS message.

So I simply waited patiently, when I checked my phone at midday, the order was still in the status and had not been delivered, I immediately contacted the customer service and requested that the order be canceled as quickly as possible, customer service responded that the operation was well.

I checked the order on my phone at 3:00 pm and saw that it was still there, I had no alternative but to contact the customer support again to inform them that this was the third call, please cancel the order and notify the seller that it will not be shipped!
At my request, customer support contacted the seller on the spot and informed me that the seller is unfamiliar with the system and will cancel the order once he becomes acquainted with it.
But please reassure me that the seller is aware and will never ship if you can.
I was in awe when I noticed that the purchase had already been dispatched when I checked the order display on Monday.
I can only phone customer service since I can't get in touch with the merchant directly.
After that, I'm just at a loss for words, in essence, I say do this action, and customer service will continue to operate.
The order is getting ready to send it again and is currently still in the delivery refusal phase!
Wouldn't Amazon go out of their way to follow up?
It makes no difference if the seller's company has already collected the money and does not follow up.
To summarize, there will never again be prepayment for huge products, this is really too bothersome.

original: 看起来很美好
很久以前就看中这个摄像头了，但是因为除了价格外，还有一些别的原因，所以没有购买，这次因为凑包邮，价格也还可以所以就买了。
买来之后其他的都没什么问题，就是在软件连接的时候，怎么都连不上，我家是TP的路由器，上网查了之后发现好多人都有这个问题，弄了两个多小时，各种改路由器的设置，最后我用360WIFI作为媒介给弄好的，期间给小米客服打电话，他们对这个问题也没有什么解决方法，直接就让我联系亚马逊进行售后。
另外一点值得注意的就是我在网上看到用户的评论说，这个摄像头支持的存储卡最小是8G，存储容量更小的就不能识别，希望大家注意这点。
用起来感觉还可以吧，画面还可以接受，但声音音质很差，机器有一定程度的发热，一直开启的话，感觉这种程度的发热有点让人难以接受。
综上所述，本产品还有诸多不足，希望大家买的时候要慎重。
translation: It looks beautiful. I had my eye on this camera a long time ago, but I didn't buy it due to some other reasons besides the price. This time, since I needed to reach the free shipping threshold and the price was reasonable, I decided to purchase it. After purchasing it, everything else was fine, but I couldn't connect it to the software no matter what. I have a TP router at home, and after searching online, I found that many people have this issue. I spent over two hours trying various router settings, and in the end, I managed to get it working by using a 360WIFI as a medium. During this time, I called Xiaomi customer service, but they didn't have any solutions for this problem and just told me to contact Amazon for after-sales support. Another point worth noting is that I saw user comments online stating that the minimum supported storage card for this camera is 8GB, and it cannot recognize cards with smaller capacities. I hope everyone pays attention to this. It feels okay to use, and the picture quality is acceptable, but the sound quality is very poor. The device heats up to a certain extent, and if it's left on continuously, the level of heat generated feels a bit unacceptable. In summary, this product has many shortcomings, and I hope everyone will be cautious when making a purchase.

之所以给3星，是因为这个是和人生的初恋买的，现在不知道用到什么程度了，或许扔掉了吧！
交往了快3年，就这样于去年离我而去了，到现在一想起她，就心痛的想要离开这个世界，人生中第一个女人，带给我一辈子的阴影和心痛，迄今还没能走出来。
买这个手机的时候，想想两个当时感觉，还是能一起同甘共苦，但现在却是不堪回首，人生或许就是这样吧，有些人一辈子都不想遇到，有些事儿一辈子都不想知道，可是有什么办法呢？
多少次一看到三星这个手机，脑海就想起她，那种痛苦就随之而来灌满全身，我从没舍得用过超过2千元的手机，可是买给她的时候，却毫不犹豫，对一个人再好，可是有天当她变心了，所有的山盟海誓也就烟消云散了。
translation: The reason I gave it 3 stars is that this was bought with my first love in life, and we dated for almost 3 years before they left me last year, and it has been like this ever since. The reason I gave it 3 stars is that this was bought with my first love in life, and now I don't know to what extent it has been used; perhaps it has been thrown away! After dating for almost three years, she left me last year. Whenever I think of her now, it hurts so much that I want to leave this world. She was the first woman in my life, leaving me with a lifetime of shadows and heartache, and I still haven't been able to move on. When I bought this phone, I thought about the two of us at that time, feeling that we could still share joys and sorrows together. But now, it's hard to look back. Perhaps that's just how life is; there are some people you never want to meet in your lifetime, and some things you never want to know. But what can you do? How many times have I seen this Samsung phone and thought of her? That pain comes flooding back, filling my entire being. I have never been willing to spend more than 2,000 yuan on a phone, but when I bought it for her, I did so without hesitation. You can treat someone so well, but one day, when they change their heart, all the promises and vows become nothing but smoke and dust.

华为是国货中的精品。
低调的老总和企业，靠的是技术和质量取胜来赢得客户，这跟当下靠广告运作来提高知名度的营商风气截然不同！

而且它的在线输入好了目的地，搜索之后自动设计出路线，离开wifi出发以后，它自动离线导航的功能很实用，不用跑流量，它直接跟卫星对话来实现定位及导航，非常好！
translation: High-quality products among domestic brands. Huawei is a premium brand among domestic products. The low-key CEO and the company rely on technology and quality to win customers, which is completely different from the current business trend of increasing visibility through advertising! Companies without strength simply cannot achieve this, nor would they dare to do so! It is precisely for this reason that I chose Huawei. Moreover, it has an online input feature for destinations, which automatically designs a route after searching. Once you leave Wi-Fi, its offline navigation function is very practical; it doesn't use data and directly communicates with satellites for positioning and navigation, which is excellent!
